flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
くさい　においを　はなつことによって
こうげきした　ときに　あいてを
ひるませることが　ある。
flavor_text.ko:
악취를 풍겨서
공격했을 때 상대가
풀죽을 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
發出臭氣，
在攻擊的時候，
有時會使對手畏縮。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon émet une odeur si nauséabonde
qu’il peut effrayer sa cible.
flavor_text.de:
Lässt das Ziel beim Angriff eventuell durch Gestank
zurückschrecken.
flavor_text.es:
Debido al mal olor que emana, al atacar al rival puede
hacerlo retroceder.
flavor_text.it:
A volte il cattivo odore emesso dal Pokémon
fa tentennare i nemici quando attacca.
flavor_text.en:
By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon
may cause the target to flinch.
flavor_text.ja:
臭い　においを　放つことによって
攻撃した　ときに　相手を
ひるませることが　ある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
通过释放臭臭的气味，
在攻击的时候，
有时会使对手畏缩。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect.

This ability does not stack with a held item.

Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
とうじょう　したときに
てんきを　あめに　する。
flavor_text.ko:
등장했을 때
날씨를 비로 만든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
出場時，
會將天氣變為下雨。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon invoque la pluie quand il entre
au combat.
flavor_text.de: Ruft bei Kampfantritt Regen herbei.
flavor_text.es: Hace que llueva cuando entra en combate.
flavor_text.it: Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, attira la pioggia.
flavor_text.en: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.
flavor_text.ja:
登場　したときに
天気を　雨に　する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场时，
会将天气变为下雨。

effect_entry:
The weather changes to rain when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless replaced by another weather condition.

If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drought, sand stream, or snow warning are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.
short_effect: Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt: まいターン　すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko: 매 턴 스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 每一回合速度會變快。
flavor_text.fr: La Vitesse du Pokémon augmente à chaque tour.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht in jeder Runde die Initiative.
flavor_text.es: Aumenta la Velocidad en cada turno.
flavor_text.it: La Velocità aumenta a ogni turno.
flavor_text.en: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.
flavor_text.ja: 毎ターン　素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 每一回合速度会变快。

effect_entry: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage after each turn.
short_effect: Raises Speed one stage after each turn.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
かたい　こうらに　まもられて
あいての　こうげきが
きゅうしょに　あたらない。
flavor_text.ko:
단단한 껍질에 보호받아
상대의 공격이
급소에 맞지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
被堅硬的甲殼守護著，
不會被對手的攻擊擊中要害。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon est protégé des coups critiques
par une solide carapace.
flavor_text.de:
Wehrt gegnerische Volltreffer mit einem harten
Panzer ab.
flavor_text.es:
La robusta coraza que lo protege bloquea los golpes
críticos.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon è protetto da una dura corazza
che gli evita di subire brutti colpi.
flavor_text.en: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
flavor_text.ja:
硬い　甲羅に　守られて
相手の　攻撃が
急所に　当たらない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
被坚硬的甲壳守护着，
不会被对手的攻击击中要害。

effect_entry:
Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.

This ability functions identically to shell armor.
short_effect: Protects against critical hits.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　わざを　うけても
いちげきで　たおされることが　ない。
いちげきひっさつわざも　きかない。
flavor_text.ko:
상대 기술을 받아도
일격으로 쓰러지지 않는다.
일격필살 기술도 효과 없다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到對手的招式攻擊時
不會被一擊打倒。
一擊必殺的招式也沒有效果。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon encaisse toujours au moins une attaque
s’il a tous ses PV. Il est également immunisé contre
les capacités pouvant mettre K.O. en un coup.
flavor_text.de:
Bietet Schutz gegen K.O.-Attacken. Bei vollen KP
übersteht das Pokémon auch K.O.-Treffer.
flavor_text.es:
Evita que el rival pueda debilitarlo de un solo golpe
cuando tiene los PS al máximo.
También anula los movimientos fulminantes.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon ha tutti i PS, evita che vada KO
in un sol colpo. Inoltre, è immune alle mosse
che causano KO immediato.
flavor_text.en:
It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO
moves cannot knock it out, either.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　技を　受けても
一撃で　倒されることが　ない。
一撃必殺技も　効かない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
即使受到对手的招式攻击，
也不会被一击打倒。
一击必杀的招式也没有效果。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP.  Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold.

If this Pokémon is holding a focus sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.
short_effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あたりを　しめらせることに　よって
じばく　などの　ばくはつする　わざを
だれも　つかえなくなる。
flavor_text.ko:
주변을 습하게 함으로써
자폭 등 폭발하는 기술을
아무도 못 쓰게 한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
透過把周圍都弄濕，
使誰都無法使用自爆等爆炸類的招式。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon augmente l’humidité de l’air,
ce qui empêche tous les Pokémon d’utiliser
des capacités explosives telles que Destruction.
flavor_text.de:
Befeuchtet die Umgebung und verhindert so den
Einsatz von Attacken wie Finale, die Explosionen
auslösen.
flavor_text.es:
Aumenta la humedad del entorno y evita que se
puedan utilizar movimientos explosivos, tales como
Autodestrucción.
flavor_text.it:
Aumenta l’umidità circostante, impedendo l’uso
di Autodistruzione e di altre mosse esplosive.
flavor_text.en:
Prevents the use of explosive moves such as
Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
flavor_text.ja:
あたりを　湿らせることに　よって
じばく　などの　爆発する　技を
だれも　使えなくなる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
通过把周围都弄湿，
使谁都无法使用自爆等爆炸类的招式。

effect_entry: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じゅうなんな　からだによって
まひ　じょうたいに　ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
유연한 몸으로 인해
마비 상태가 되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因為身體柔軟，
不會陷入麻痺狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon s’est suffisamment échauffé,
ce qui l’immunise contre la paralysie.
flavor_text.de:
Der flexible Körper des Pokémon schützt es vor
Paralyse.
flavor_text.es:
Evita ser paralizado gracias a la flexibilidad de su
cuerpo.
flavor_text.it:
Il corpo flessibile del Pokémon gli impedisce
di subire gli effetti della paralisi.
flavor_text.en: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
flavor_text.ja:
柔軟な　体によって
まひ状態に　ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为身体柔软，
不会变为麻痹状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be paralyzed.

If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
short_effect: Prevents paralysis.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
すなあらしの　とき
かいひりつが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
모래바람일 때
회피율이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
在沙暴中
閃避率會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente l’Esquive du Pokémon lors des tempêtes
de sable.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht in Sandstürmen den Fluchtwert.
flavor_text.es: Aumenta la Evasión durante las tormentas de arena.
flavor_text.it: L’elusione aumenta durante le tempeste di sabbia.
flavor_text.en: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.
flavor_text.ja:
砂あらしの　とき
回避率が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
在沙暴的时候，
闪避率会提高。

effect_entry:
During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.

The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.
short_effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
せいでんきを　からだに　まとい
さわった　あいてを
まひさせる　ことがある。
flavor_text.ko:
정전기를 몸에 둘러
접촉한 상대를
마비시킬 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
身上帶有靜電，
有時會令接觸到的對手麻痺。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon charge son corps en électricité statique,
et tout contact avec lui peut paralyser.
flavor_text.de:
Kann bei Berührung durch statisch aufgeladenen
Körper paralysieren.
flavor_text.es:
La electricidad estática que lo envuelve puede
paralizar al mínimo contacto.
flavor_text.it:
Il contatto fisico con il corpo percorso
dall’elettricità statica del Pokémon può
causare paralisi.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is charged with static electricity, so
contact with it may cause paralysis.
flavor_text.ja:
静電気を　体に　まとい
触った　相手を
まひさせる　ことがある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
身上带有静电，
有时会让接触到的对手麻痹。

effect_entry:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed.

Pokémon that are immune to electric-type moves can still be paralyzed by this ability.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, there is a 50% chance that encounters will be with an electric Pokémon, if applicable.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
でんきタイプの　わざを　うけると
ダメージを　うけずに　かいふくする。
flavor_text.ko:
전기타입의 기술을 받으면
데미지를 받지 않고 회복한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到電屬性的招式攻擊時，
不會受到傷害，而是會回復。
flavor_text.fr:
Si le Pokémon est touché par une capacité Électrik,
il ne subit aucun dégât et regagne des PV à la place.
flavor_text.de:
Treffer durch Elektro-Attacken verursachen keinen
Schaden, sondern regenerieren stattdessen KP.
flavor_text.es:
Si le alcanza un movimiento de tipo Eléctrico,
recupera PS en vez de sufrir daño.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon subisce una mossa di tipo Elettro,
recupera PS anziché subire danni.
flavor_text.en:
Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead
of taking damage.
flavor_text.ja:
でんきタイプの　技を　受けると
ダメージを　受けずに　回復する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到电属性的招式攻击时，
不会受到伤害，而是会回复。

effect_entry:
Whenever an electric-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.

This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. thunder wave.
short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
みずタイプの　わざを　うけると
ダメージを　うけずに　かいふくする。
flavor_text.ko:
물타입의 기술을 받으면
데미지를 받지 않고 회복한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到水屬性的招式攻擊時，
不會受到傷害，而是會回復。
flavor_text.fr:
Si le Pokémon est touché par une capacité Eau,
il ne subit aucun dégât et regagne des PV à la place.
flavor_text.de:
Treffer durch Wasser-Attacken verursachen keinen
Schaden, sondern regenerieren stattdessen KP.
flavor_text.es:
Si le alcanza un movimiento de tipo Agua,
recupera PS en vez de sufrir daño.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon subisce una mossa di tipo Acqua,
recupera PS anziché subire danni.
flavor_text.en:
Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of
taking damage.
flavor_text.ja:
みずタイプの　技を　受けると
ダメージを　受けずに　回復する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到水属性的招式攻击时，
不会受到伤害，而是会回复。

effect_entry:
Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.

Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.
short_effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
どんかん　なので
メロメロや　ちょうはつ　じょうたいに
ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
둔감해서
헤롱헤롱이나 도발 상태가
되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
感覺遲鈍，
不會陷入著迷和被挑釁狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon est un grand benêt, ce qui l’immunise
contre l’attraction ou la provocation.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon ist so apathisch, dass es nicht betört
oder provoziert werden kann.
flavor_text.es:
La indiferencia del Pokémon evita que caiga presa
del enamoramiento o sea provocado.
flavor_text.it:
L’imperturbabilità del Pokémon lo protegge
da infatuazioni e provocazioni.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is oblivious, and that keeps it from
being infatuated or falling for taunts.
flavor_text.ja:
鈍感なので
メロメロや　ちょうはつ状態に
ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为感觉迟钝，
不会变为着迷和被挑衅状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be infatuated and is immune to captivate.

If a Pokémon is infatuated and acquires this ability, its infatuation is cleared.
short_effect: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あらゆる　てんきの　えいきょうが
なくなって　しまう。
flavor_text.ko:
모든 날씨의 영향이
없어진다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 任何天氣的影響都會消失。
flavor_text.fr: Annule tous les effets liés à la météo.
flavor_text.de: Hebt alle Wetter-Effekte auf.
flavor_text.es: Anula todos los efectos del tiempo atmosférico.
flavor_text.it:
Neutralizza gli effetti di tutte le condizioni
atmosferiche.
flavor_text.en: Eliminates the effects of weather.
flavor_text.ja:
あらゆる　天気の　影響が
なくなって　しまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 任何天气的影响都会消失。

effect_entry:
While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.

This ability functions identically to air lock.
short_effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ふくがんを　もっているため
わざの　めいちゅうりつが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
복안을 가지고 있어
기술의 명중률이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因為擁有複眼，
會提高招式的命中率。
flavor_text.fr:
Les yeux à facettes du Pokémon augmentent
sa Précision.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht die Genauigkeit von Attacken.
flavor_text.es: Aumenta la precisión de sus movimientos.
flavor_text.it:
La precisione del Pokémon aumenta grazie ai suoi
occhi composti.
flavor_text.en: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy.
flavor_text.ja:
複眼を　持っているため
技の　命中率が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为拥有复眼，
招式的命中率会提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their accuracy.

This ability has no effect on the one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold).

Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, the chance of a wild Pokémon holding a particular item is raised from 50%, 5%, or 1% to 60%, 20%, or 5%, respectively.
short_effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.3×.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ねむれない　たいしつ　なので
ねむり　じょうたいに　ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
잠들지 못하는 체질이라
잠듦 상태가 되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因為擁有不會睡覺的體質，
所以不會陷入睡眠狀態。
flavor_text.fr: Le Pokémon est incapable de dormir.
flavor_text.de: Verhindert Einschlafen.
flavor_text.es: Su resistencia al sueño le impide quedarse dormido.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon soffre d’insonnia e non può finire
addormentato.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is suffering from insomnia and cannot
fall asleep.
flavor_text.ja:
眠れない　体質　なので
ねむり状態に　ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为是不会睡觉的体质，
所以不会变为睡眠状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be asleep.

This causes rest to fail altogether.  If a Pokémon is asleep and acquires this ability, it will immediately wake up; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

This ability functions identically to vital spirit in battle.
short_effect: Prevents sleep.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいてから　うけた　わざの　タイプに
じぶんの　タイプが　へんか　する。
flavor_text.ko:
상대에게 받은 기술의 타입으로
자신의 타입이 변화한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
自己的屬性會變為
從對手所受招式的屬性。
flavor_text.fr:
Lorsque le Pokémon est touché par une capacité,
il prend le type de celle-ci.
flavor_text.de:
Ändert seinen Typ zu dem der Attacke des
Angreifers.
flavor_text.es:
Adopta el tipo del último movimiento del que se es
blanco.
flavor_text.it: Il Pokémon acquisisce il tipo della mossa subita.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move
used on it.
flavor_text.ja:
相手から　受けた　技の　タイプに
自分の　タイプが　変化　する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
自己的属性会变为
从对手处所受招式的属性。

effect_entry:
Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move, the Pokémon's type changes to match the move.

If the Pokémon has two types, both are overridden.  The Pokémon must directly take damage; for example, moves blocked by a substitute will not trigger this ability, nor will moves that deal damage indirectly, such as spikes.

This ability takes effect on only the last hit of a multiple-hit attack.

In Pokémon Colosseum and XD: Gale of Darkness, this ability does not take effect on Shadow-type moves.
short_effect: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
たいないに　めんえきを　もっているため
どく　じょうたいに　ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
체내에 면역을 가지고 있어
독 상태가 되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因為體內擁有免疫能力，
不會陷入中毒狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon est naturellement immunisé
contre toute forme de poison.
flavor_text.de:
Das starke Immunsystem des Pokémon verhindert
Vergiftungen.
flavor_text.es: Su sistema inmunitario evita el envenenamiento.
flavor_text.it:
L’immunità naturale del Pokémon gli impedisce
di essere avvelenato.
flavor_text.en:
The immune system of the Pokémon prevents it from
getting poisoned.
flavor_text.ja:
体内に　免疫を　持っているため
どく状態に　ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为体内拥有免疫能力，
不会变为中毒状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be poisoned.  This includes bad poison.

If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
short_effect: Prevents poison.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ほのおタイプの　わざを　うけると
ほのおを　もらい　じぶんが　だす
ほのおタイプの　わざが　つよくなる。
flavor_text.ko:
불꽃타입의 기술을 받으면
불꽃을 받아서 자신이 사용하는
불꽃타입의 기술이 강해진다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到火屬性的招式攻擊時，
吸收火焰，讓自己使出的
火屬性招式變強。
flavor_text.fr:
Lorsque le Pokémon est touché par une capacité
de type Feu, il absorbe la chaleur pour renforcer
ses propres capacités Feu.
flavor_text.de:
Verstärkt Feuer-Attacken, wenn es von
Feuer-Attacken getroffen wird.
flavor_text.es:
Si le alcanza algún movimiento de tipo Fuego,
potencia sus propios movimientos de dicho tipo.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon subisce una mossa di tipo Fuoco,
ne sfrutta il calore per potenziare le proprie mosse
dello stesso tipo.
flavor_text.en:
Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit
by one.
flavor_text.ja:
ほのおタイプの　技を　受けると
炎を　もらい　自分が　出す
ほのおタイプの　技が　強くなる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到火属性的招式攻击时，
吸收火焰，自己使出的
火属性招式会变强。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon is immune to fire-type moves.  Once this Pokémon has been hit by a Fire move, its own Fire moves will inflict 1.5× as much damage until it leaves battle.

This ability has no effect while the Pokémon is frozen.  The Fire damage bonus is retained even if the Pokémon is frozen and thawed or the ability is lost or disabled.  Fire moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.  This ability takes effect even on non-damaging moves, i.e. will o wisp.
short_effect: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
りんぷんに　まもられて
わざの　ついかこうかを　うけなくなる。
flavor_text.ko:
인분에 보호받아
기술의 추가 효과를 받지 않게 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
被鱗粉守護著，
不會受到招式的追加效果影響。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon dispose d’un écran naturel qui le
protège des effets additionnels des attaques
ennemies.
flavor_text.de:
Blockiert durch Puder die Zusatzeffekte
gegnerischer Angriffe.
flavor_text.es:
El polvo de escamas que lo envuelve lo protege de
los efectos secundarios de los ataques recibidos.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon è protetto da uno strato di scaglie
che annulla gli effetti secondari delle mosse subite.
flavor_text.en:
This Pokémon’s dust blocks the additional effects of
attacks taken.
flavor_text.ja:
りんぷんに　守られて
技の　追加効果を　受けなくなる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
被鳞粉守护着，
不会受到招式的追加效果影响。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon is immune to the extra effects of moves used against it.

An extra effect is a move's chance, listed as an "effect chance", to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, thunder shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder wave's is not, nor are knock off's item removal and air cutter's increased critical hit rate.
short_effect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
マイペースなので
こんらん　じょうたいに　ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
마이페이스라서
혼란 상태가 되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因為我行我素，
不會陷入混亂狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon vit sa vie à son propre rythme,
ce qui l’immunise contre la confusion.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon lässt sich nicht aus der Ruhe bringen
und verhindert so Verwirrung.
flavor_text.es:
Como le gusta hacer las cosas a su manera, los
rivales no logran confundirlo.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon affronta la vita al proprio ritmo e per
questo non può essere colpito dalla confusione.
flavor_text.en:
This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents
it from becoming confused.
flavor_text.ja:
マイペースなので
こんらん状態に　ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为我行我素，
不会变为混乱状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be confused.

If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
short_effect: Prevents confusion.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
きゅうばんで　じめんに　はりつき
ポケモンを　いれかえさせる
わざや　どうぐが　きかなくなる。
flavor_text.ko:
흡반으로 지면에 달라붙어
포켓몬을 교체시키는
기술이나 도구의 효과를 발휘하지 못하게 한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
用吸盤將自己牢牢吸附在地面上，
讓替換寶可夢的招式和道具失效。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon est solidement fixé au sol, ce qui
le protège des capacités ou objets qui font changer
de Pokémon.
flavor_text.de:
Blockt Attacken und Items, die Pokémon
austauschen, indem es sich mit einem Saugnapf
am Boden verankert.
flavor_text.es:
Sus ventosas se aferran al suelo, con lo cual anula
movimientos y objetos que fuerzan el relevo.
flavor_text.it:
Resiste a strumenti e mosse che causano la
sostituzione appiccicandosi al terreno con
le ventose.
flavor_text.en:
This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot
to negate all moves and items that force
switching out.
flavor_text.ja:
吸盤で　地面に　張り付き
ポケモンを　入れ替えさせる
技や　道具が　効かなくなる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
用吸盘牢牢贴在地面上，
让替换宝可梦的招式和道具无效。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be forced out of battle by moves such as whirlwind.

dragon tail and circle throw still inflict damage against this Pokémon.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the success rate while fishing is increased.
short_effect: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
とうじょう　したとき　いかくして
あいてを　いしゅくさせ
あいての　こうげきを　さげて　しまう。
flavor_text.ko:
등장했을 때 위협해서
상대를 위축시켜
상대의 공격을 떨어뜨린다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
出場時威嚇對手，
使其退縮，
從而降低對手的攻擊。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon rugit lorsqu’il arrive au combat,
ce qui intimide l’ennemi et baisse son Attaque.
flavor_text.de:
Senkt den Angriff der Gegner, indem es sie gleich zu
Kampfantritt bedroht und einschüchtert.
flavor_text.es:
Al entrar en combate amilana al rival de tal manera
que su Ataque disminuye.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, la sua
prepotenza intimidisce i nemici, riducendone
l’Attacco.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon
entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
flavor_text.ja:
登場　したとき　威嚇して
相手を　萎縮させ
相手の　攻撃を　下げて　しまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场时威吓对手，
让其退缩，
降低对手的攻击。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon enters battle, the opponent's Attack is lowered by one stage.  In a double battle, both opponents are affected.

This ability also takes effect when acquired during a battle, but will not take effect again if lost and reobtained without leaving battle.

This ability has no effect on an opponent that has a substitute.

Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.
short_effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　かげを　ふみ
にげたり　こうたい　できなくする。
flavor_text.ko:
상대의 그림자를 밟아
도망치거나 교체할 수 없게 한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
踩住對手的影子
使其無法逃走或替換。
flavor_text.fr: Empêche le Pokémon ennemi de quitter le combat.
flavor_text.de:
Hindert den Gegner an der Flucht beziehungsweise
am Auswechseln, indem es ihm den Weg versperrt.
flavor_text.es: Evita que el enemigo huya o sea cambiado por otro.
flavor_text.it:
Calpesta l’ombra del nemico impedendogli la fuga
o la sostituzione.
flavor_text.en:
This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s
shadow to prevent it from escaping.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　影を　踏み
逃げたり　交代　できなくする。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
踩住对手的影子
使其无法逃走或替换。

effect_entry:
While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.

Other Pokémon with this ability are unaffected.  Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.
short_effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうげきを　うけたとき
じぶんに　ふれた　あいてを
ざらざらの　はだで　キズつける。
flavor_text.ko:
공격을 받았을 때
자신에게 접촉한 상대를
까칠까칠한 피부로 상처를 입힌다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到攻擊時，
用粗糙的皮膚弄傷
接觸到自己的對手。
flavor_text.fr:
Blesse l’attaquant lorsque le Pokémon subit
une attaque directe.
flavor_text.de:
Angreifer werden durch die raue Haut des Pokémon
bei direkten Attacken verletzt.
flavor_text.es:
Hiere con su piel áspera al rival que lo ataque con un
movimiento de contacto.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon è colpito da un attacco diretto, grazie
alla sua pelle ruvida infligge danni a sua volta.
flavor_text.en:
This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin
to the attacker on contact.
flavor_text.ja:
攻撃を　受けたとき
自分に　触れた　相手を
ざらざらの　肌で　キズつける。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到攻击时，
用粗糙的皮肤弄伤
接触到自己的对手。

effect_entry:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage.

This ability functions identically to iron barbs.
short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうかばつぐんの　わざしか
あたらない　ふしぎな　ちから。
flavor_text.ko:
효과가 굉장한 기술만
맞는 불가사의한 힘.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
不可思議的力量，
只有效果絕佳的招式才會擊中自己。
flavor_text.fr:
Une puissance mystérieuse protège le Pokémon
contre toutes les capacités, sauf celles « super
efficaces ».
flavor_text.de:
Wundersame Kräfte bewirken, dass nur sehr
effektive Treffer bei ihm Schaden anrichten.
flavor_text.es:
Gracias a un poder misterioso, solo le hacen daño los
movimientos supereficaces.
flavor_text.it:
Un potere misterioso protegge il Pokémon e lo
rende vulnerabile solo alle mosse superefficaci.
flavor_text.en:
Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves
hit the Pokémon.
flavor_text.ja:
効果バツグンの　技しか
当たらない　不思議な　力。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
不可思议的力量，
只有效果绝佳的招式才能击中。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon is immune to damaging moves that are not super effective against it.

Moves that inflict fixed damage, such as night shade or seismic toss, are considered super effective if their types are.  Damage not directly dealt by moves, such as damage from weather, a status ailment, or spikes, is not prevented.

This ability cannot be copied with role play or traded away with skill swap, but it can be copied with trace, disabled with gastro acid, or changed with worry seed.  This Pokémon can still use Role Play itself to lose this ability, but not Skill Swap.

If this Pokémon has a substitute, this ability will block moves as usual and any moves not blocked will react to the Substitute as usual.
short_effect: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じめんから　うくことによって
じめんタイプの　わざを　うけない。
flavor_text.ko:
땅에서 뜨는 것으로
땅타입의 기술을 받지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
從地面浮起，
從而不會受到地面屬性招式的攻擊。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon flotte, ce qui l’immunise contre
les capacités de type Sol.
flavor_text.de:
Verleiht volle Immunität gegen alle Boden-Attacken
durch Schwebezustand.
flavor_text.es:
Su capacidad de flotar sobre el suelo le proporciona
inmunidad frente a los movimientos de tipo Tierra.
flavor_text.it:
La capacità di levitare senza toccare il suolo
conferisce immunità agli attacchi di tipo Terra.
flavor_text.en:
By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full
immunity to all Ground-type moves.
flavor_text.ja:
地面から　浮くことによって
じめんタイプの　技を　受けない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
从地面浮起，
从而不会受到地面属性招式的攻击。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap.

This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball.  This ability is not disabled during roost.
short_effect: Evades ground moves.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうげきで　じぶんに　ふれた　あいてを
どくや　まひや　ねむり　じょうたいに
する　ことがある。
flavor_text.ko:
공격으로 자신에게 접촉한 상대를
독이나 마비, 잠듦 상태로
만들 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
透過攻擊有時會使接觸到自己的對手，
陷入中毒、麻痺或睡眠狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Peut paralyser, empoisonner ou endormir l’attaquant
lorsque le Pokémon subit une attaque directe.
flavor_text.de:
Wird dieses Pokémon durch eine direkte Attacke
angegriffen, kann das beim Gegner Paralyse,
Vergiftung oder Schlaf auslösen.
flavor_text.es:
Puede dormir, envenenar o paralizar al Pokémon con
el que entre en contacto al recibir un ataque.
flavor_text.it:
Può causare avvelenamento, paralisi o sonno
a chi manda a segno un attacco diretto.
flavor_text.en:
Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep,
or paralysis on its attacker.
flavor_text.ja:
攻撃で　自分に　触れた　相手を
どくや　まひや　ねむり状態に
する　ことがある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到攻击时，
有时会把接触到自己的对手
变为中毒、麻痹或睡眠状态。

effect_entry:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed, poisoned, or put to sleep, chosen at random.

Nothing is done to compensate if the move's user is immune to one of these ailments; there is simply a lower chance that the move's user will be affected.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じぶんが　なってしまった
どくや　まひや　やけどを
あいてに　うつす。
flavor_text.ko:
자신이 걸린
독이나 마비, 화상을
상대에게 옮긴다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
將自己的中毒、麻痺或
灼傷狀態傳染給對手。
flavor_text.fr:
Quand le Pokémon est brûlé, paralysé ou empoisonné
par un autre Pokémon, il partage ce statut avec
celui-ci.
flavor_text.de:
Erleidet das Pokémon Verbrennungen, Vergiftungen
oder Paralyse, ereilt das jeweilige Statusproblem
auch den Verursacher.
flavor_text.es:
Contagia el envenenamiento, las quemaduras o la
parálisis al Pokémon que le cause ese estado.
flavor_text.it:
Se un nemico avvelena, paralizza o scotta un
Pokémon con questa abilità, viene affetto dallo
stesso stato.
flavor_text.en:
The attacker will receive the same status condition if
it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.
flavor_text.ja:
自分が　なってしまった
どくや　まひや　やけどを
相手に　うつす。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
将自己的中毒、麻痹
或灼伤状态传染给对手。

effect_entry:
Whenever this Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, the Pokémon who gave this Pokémon that ailment is also given the ailment.

This ability passes back bad poison when this Pokémon is badly poisoned.  This ability cannot pass on a status ailment that the Pokémon did not directly receive from another Pokémon, such as the poison from toxic spikes or the burn from a flame orb.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, wild Pokémon have a 50% chance of having the lead Pokémon's nature, and a 50% chance of being given a random nature as usual, including the lead Pokémon's nature.  This does not work on Pokémon received outside of battle or roaming legendaries.
short_effect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　わざや　とくせいで
のうりょくを　さげられない。
flavor_text.ko:
상대 기술이나 특성으로
능력을 떨어뜨릴 수 없다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
不會因對手的招式或特性
而被降低能力。
flavor_text.fr:
Empêche les stats du Pokémon de baisser à cause
d’une capacité ou d’un talent.
flavor_text.de:
Verhindert das Senken der Statuswerte durch
Attacken und Fähigkeiten von Angreifern.
flavor_text.es:
Evita que bajen sus características a causa de
movimientos o habilidades de otros Pokémon.
flavor_text.it:
Rende immuni alla diminuzione delle statistiche
causata da abilità o mosse di altri Pokémon.
flavor_text.en:
Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokémon’s stats.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　技や　特性で
能力を　下げられない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
不会因为对手的招式或特性
而被降低能力。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot have its stats lowered by other Pokémon.

This ability does not prevent any stat losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Speed cut from paralysis.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative stat modifiers through guard swap, heart swap, or power swap.

This ability functions identically to white smoke in battle.
short_effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てもちに　ひっこむと
じょうたい　いじょうが　なおる。
flavor_text.ko:
지닌 포켓몬으로 돌아오면
상태 이상이 회복된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
異常狀態會在
離場後治癒。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon soigne ses altérations de statut
en quittant le combat.
flavor_text.de:
Wird das Pokémon ausgewechselt, werden seine
Statusprobleme geheilt.
flavor_text.es: Cura problemas de estado al cambiar de Pokémon.
flavor_text.it:
Cura i problemi di stato quando il Pokémon
viene sostituito.
flavor_text.en:
All status conditions heal when the Pokémon
switches out.
flavor_text.ja:
手持ちに　ひっこむと
状態異常が　治る。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
回到同行队伍后，
异常状态就会被治愈。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment when it is switched out for another Pokémon.

If this ability is acquired during battle, the Pokémon is cured upon leaving battle before losing the temporary ability.
short_effect: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
でんきタイプの　わざを　じぶんに
よせつけ　ダメージを　うけずに
とくこうが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
전기타입의 기술을 자신에게
끌어모아 데미지를 받지 않고
특수공격을 올린다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
將電屬性的招式吸引到自己身上，
不但不會受到傷害，反而會提高特攻。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon détourne sur lui les capacités de
type Électrik et les neutralise, tout en montant
son Attaque Spéciale.
flavor_text.de:
Zieht Elektro-Attacken an. Statt durch diese
Schaden zu nehmen, erhöht es den eigenen
Spezial-Angriff.
flavor_text.es:
Además de atraer y neutralizar los movimientos de
tipo Eléctrico, sube el Ataque Especial.
flavor_text.it:
Attira e neutralizza mosse di tipo Elettro
e aumenta l’Attacco Speciale.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. 
Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, 
it boosts its Sp. Atk.
flavor_text.ja:
でんきタイプの　技を　自分に
寄せつけ　ダメージを　受けずに
特攻が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
将电属性的招式吸引到自己身上，
不会受到伤害，而是会提高特攻。

effect_entry:
All other Pokémon's single-target electric-type moves are redirected to this Pokémon if it is an eligible target.  Other Pokémon's Electric moves raise this Pokémon's Special Attack one stage, negating any other effect on it, and cannot miss it.

If the move's intended target also has this ability, the move is not redirected.  When multiple Pokémon with this ability are possible targets for redirection, the move is redirected to the one with the highest Speed stat, or, in the case of a tie, to a random tied Pokémon.  follow me takes precedence over this ability.

If the Pokémon is a ground-type and thus immune to Electric moves, its immunity prevents the Special Attack boost.
short_effect: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんのめぐみの　おかげで
わざの　ついかこうかが　でやすい。
flavor_text.ko:
하늘의 은총 덕분에
기술의 추가 효과가 나오기 쉽다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到上天保佑，
容易出現招式的追加效果。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente les chances d’infliger des effets
additionnels.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass Zusatzeffekte
von Attacken auftreten.
flavor_text.es:
Aumenta la probabilidad de que los movimientos
causen efectos secundarios.
flavor_text.it: Gli effetti secondari delle mosse sono più probabili.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts the likelihood of additional effects occurring 
when attacking.
flavor_text.ja:
天の恵みの　おかげで
技の　追加効果が　でやすい。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
托天恩的福，
招式的追加效果容易出现。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's moves have twice their usual effect chance.

An effect chance is a move's chance to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect.  For example, flamethrower's chance of burning the target is doubled, but protect's chance of success and air cutter's increased critical hit rate are unaffected.

secret power is unaffected.
short_effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　あめのとき
すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
비가 오는 날씨일 때
스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣為下雨時，
速度會提高。
flavor_text.fr: Augmente la Vitesse du Pokémon s’il pleut.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht bei Regen die Initiative.
flavor_text.es: Sube la Velocidad cuando llueve.
flavor_text.it: Se piove, la Velocità aumenta.
flavor_text.en: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　雨のとき
素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
下雨天气时，
速度会提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
short_effect: Doubles Speed during rain.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　はれのとき
すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
날씨가 맑을 때
스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣為晴朗時，
速度會提高。
flavor_text.fr: Augmente la Vitesse du Pokémon s’il y a du soleil.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht bei Sonnenschein die Initiative.
flavor_text.es: Sube la Velocidad cuando hace sol.
flavor_text.it: Se la luce del sole è intensa, la Velocità aumenta.
flavor_text.en: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　晴れのとき
素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
晴朗天气时，
速度会提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
short_effect: Doubles Speed during strong sunlight.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あたりを　あかるくする　ことで
やせいの　ポケモンに
そうぐう　しやすくなる。
flavor_text.ko:
주변을 밝게 하는 것으로
야생 포켓몬과
만나기 쉬워진다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
透過讓周圍變亮，
變得容易遇見野生的寶可夢。
flavor_text.fr:
Émet une lumière spécifique qui facilite les
rencontres avec les Pokémon sauvages.
flavor_text.de:
Erhellt die Umgebung und erhöht dadurch die
Wahrscheinlichkeit, wilden Pokémon zu begegnen.
flavor_text.es:
Aumenta la probabilidad de encontrar Pokémon al
aumentar la visibilidad del entorno.
flavor_text.it:
Illumina tutto intorno, rendendo più probabile
incontrare Pokémon selvatici.
flavor_text.en:
Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon by
illuminating the surroundings.
flavor_text.ja:
あたりを　明るくする　ことで
野生の　ポケモンに
遭遇　しやすくなる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
通过让周围变亮，
变得容易遇到野生的宝可梦。

effect_entry:
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

This ability has no effect in battle.
short_effect: Doubles the wild encounter rate.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
とうじょう　したとき
あいての　とくせいを　トレースして
おなじ　とくせいに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
등장했을 때
상대의 특성을 트레이스해서
같은 특성이 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
出場時，複製對手的特性，
變為與之相同的特性。
flavor_text.fr:
Lorsque le Pokémon entre au combat, il calque
le talent d’un ennemi pour remplacer le sien.
flavor_text.de: Kopiert bei Kampfantritt die Fähigkeit eines Gegners.
flavor_text.es: Al entrar en combate copia la habilidad del rival.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, copia l’abilità
di un nemico.
flavor_text.en:
When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an
opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
flavor_text.ja:
登場　したとき
相手の　特性を　トレースして
同じ　特性に　なる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场时，复制对手的特性，
变为与之相同的特性。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it copies a random opponent's ability.

This ability cannot copy flower gift, forecast, illusion, imposter, multitype, trace, wonder guard, or zen mode.
short_effect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ぶつり　こうげきの
いりょくが　２ばいに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
물리공격의
위력이 2배가 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 物理攻擊的威力會變為２倍。
flavor_text.fr: Double l’Attaque du Pokémon.
flavor_text.de: Verdoppelt die Stärke von physischen Attacken.
flavor_text.es: Duplica la potencia de los ataques físicos.
flavor_text.it: L’Attacco del Pokémon raddoppia.
flavor_text.en: Doubles the Pokémon’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ja:
物理攻撃の
威力が　２倍になる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 物理攻击的威力会变为２倍。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's Attack is doubled while in battle.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

This ability functions identically to pure power.
short_effect: Doubles Attack in battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じぶんに　さわった　あいてを
どく　じょうたいに　する　ことがある。
flavor_text.ko:
자신과 접촉한 상대를
독 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
有時會讓接觸到自己的
對手陷入中毒狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Peut empoisonner l’attaquant lorsque le Pokémon
subit une attaque directe.
flavor_text.de: Vergiftet den Angreifer bei Berührung eventuell.
flavor_text.es: Puede envenenar al mínimo contacto.
flavor_text.it:
Può avvelenare chi manda a segno
un attacco diretto.
flavor_text.en: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
flavor_text.ja:
自分に　触った　相手を
どく状態に　することがある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
有时会让接触到自己的
对手变为中毒状态。

effect_entry: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being poisoned.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
きたえられた　せいしんに　よって
あいての　こうげきに　ひるまない。
flavor_text.ko:
단련한 정신으로 인하여
상대의 공격에 풀죽지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
靠著經過鍛鍊精神，
不會因對手的攻擊而畏縮。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon a un mental à toute épreuve qui
empêche les capacités ennemies de lui faire peur.
flavor_text.de:
Verhindert durch erhöhte Konzentrationsfähigkeit
Zurückschrecken.
flavor_text.es:
Gracias a su profunda concentración, no retrocede
ante los ataques del rival.
flavor_text.it:
La capacità di concentrazione del Pokémon evita
che tentenni per gli attacchi del nemico.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon’s intensely focused, and that protects
the Pokémon from flinching.
flavor_text.ja:
鍛えられた　精神に　よって
相手の　攻撃に　ひるまない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
通过锻炼精神，
不会因对手的攻击而畏缩。

effect_entry: This Pokémon cannot flinch.
short_effect: Prevents flinching.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あつい　マグマを　みにまとい
こおり　じょうたいに　ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
뜨거운 마그마를 몸에 둘러서
얼음 상태가 되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
將熾熱的熔岩覆蓋在身上，
不會陷入冰凍狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Le magma qui recouvre le corps du Pokémon
le protège contre le gel.
flavor_text.de:
Dank eines Panzers aus Magma kann dieses
Pokémon nicht eingefroren werden.
flavor_text.es:
Gracias al magma candente que lo envuelve, evita la
congelación.
flavor_text.it:
Il magma riveste il corpo del Pokémon
impedendogli di venire congelato.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which
prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.
flavor_text.ja:
熱い　マグマを　身にまとい
こおり状態に　ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
将炽热的熔岩覆盖在身上，
不会变为冰冻状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be frozen.

If a Pokémon is frozen and acquires this ability, it will immediately thaw out; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

Overworld: If any Pokémon in the party has this ability, each egg in the party has its hatch counter decreased by 2 (rather than 1) each step cycle, making eggs hatch roughly twice as quickly.  This effect does not stack if multiple Pokémon have this ability or flame body.
short_effect: Prevents freezing.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
みずのベールを　みにまとい
やけど　じょうたいに　ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
물의 베일을 몸에 둘러서
화상 상태가 되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
將水幕裹在身上，
不會陷入灼傷狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Le voile qui recouvre le Pokémon le protège
des brûlures.
flavor_text.de:
Verhindert durch eine Hülle aus Wasser
Verbrennungen.
flavor_text.es:
Evita las quemaduras gracias a la capa de agua que
lo envuelve.
flavor_text.it:
Un velo d’acqua riveste il corpo del Pokémon
impedendogli di venire scottato.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is covered with a water veil, which
prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
flavor_text.ja:
水のベールを　身にまとい
やけど状態に　ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
将水幕裹在身上，
不会变为灼伤状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be burned.

If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
short_effect: Prevents burns.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
はがねタイプの　ポケモンを
じりょくで　ひきつけて
にげられなくする。
flavor_text.ko:
강철타입의 포켓몬을
자력으로 끌어모아
도망칠 수 없게 한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
用磁力吸住鋼屬性的寶可夢，
使其無法逃走。
flavor_text.fr:
Attire les Pokémon Acier grâce à un champ
magnétique, ce qui les empêche de fuir.
flavor_text.de:
Hindert Stahl-Pokémon durch Magnetismus an der
Flucht.
flavor_text.es:
Su magnetismo atrae a los Pokémon de tipo Acero y
les impide huir.
flavor_text.it:
La carica magnetica attrae i Pokémon di tipo
Acciaio impedendone la fuga o la sostituzione.
flavor_text.en:
Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from escaping using
its magnetic force.
flavor_text.ja:
はがねタイプの　ポケモンを
磁力で　引きつけて
逃げられなくする。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
用磁力吸住钢属性的宝可梦，
使其无法逃走。

effect_entry:
While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing steel-type Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.

Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, Steel-type Pokémon have a higher encounter rate.
short_effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
おとを　しゃだん　することに　よって
おとの　こうげきを　うけない。
flavor_text.ko:
소리를 차단하는 것으로
소리 공격을 받지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
透過遮蔽聲音，
不受到聲音招式的攻擊。
flavor_text.fr: Protège le Pokémon de toutes les capacités sonores.
flavor_text.de:
Bietet durch Schalldämmung volle Immunität gegen
alle Lärm-Attacken.
flavor_text.es:
Su aislamiento acústico lo protege de movimientos
que usan sonido.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon è dotato di una sorta di isolamento
acustico che lo rende immune alle mosse basate
sul suono.
flavor_text.en:
Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full 
immunity to all sound-based moves.
flavor_text.ja:
音を　遮断　することに　よって
音の　攻撃を　受けない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
通过屏蔽声音，
不受到声音招式的攻击。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon is immune to moves flagged as being sound-based.

heal bell is unaffected.  uproar still prevents this Pokémon from sleeping.  This Pokémon can still receive a Perish Song counter through baton pass, and will retain a Perish Song counter if it acquires this ability after Perish Song is used.

howl, roar of time, sonic boom, and yawn are not flagged as sound-based.
short_effect: Protects against sound-based moves.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　あめのとき
すこしずつ　ＨＰを　かいふくする。
flavor_text.ko:
비가 오는 날씨일 때
조금씩 HP를 회복한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣為下雨時，
會漸漸回復ＨＰ。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon récupère progressivement des PV
lorsqu’il pleut.
flavor_text.de: Stellt bei Regen langsam und stetig KP wieder her.
flavor_text.es: Recupera PS de forma gradual cuando llueve.
flavor_text.it: Il Pokémon recupera PS quando piove.
flavor_text.en: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　雨のとき
少しずつ　ＨＰを　回復する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
下雨天气时，
会缓缓回复ＨＰ。

effect_entry: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during rain.
short_effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
とうじょう　したとき
てんきを　すなあらしに　する。
flavor_text.ko:
등장했을 때
날씨를 모래바람으로 만든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
出場時，
會把天氣變為沙暴。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon invoque une tempête de sable
quand il entre au combat.
flavor_text.de: Erzeugt bei Kampfantritt Sandstürme.
flavor_text.es: Crea una tormenta de arena al entrar en combate.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, scatena
una tempesta di sabbia.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters
a battle.
flavor_text.ja:
登場　したとき
天気を　砂あらしにする。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场时，
会把天气变为沙暴。

effect_entry:
The weather changes to a sandstorm when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.

If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, drought, or snow warning are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.
short_effect: Summons a sandstorm that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
プレッシャーを　あたえて
あいての　つかう　わざの　ＰＰを
おおく　へらす。
flavor_text.ko:
프레셔를 줘서
상대가 쓰는 기술의 PP를
많이 줄인다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
給予對手壓迫感，
大量減少其使用招式的ＰＰ。
flavor_text.fr: Force l’ennemi à dépenser plus de PP.
flavor_text.de:
Zwingt den Gegner dazu, beim Einsatz von Attacken
mehr AP zu verbrauchen.
flavor_text.es: Presiona al rival para que sus PP se acaben antes.
flavor_text.it:
Mette pressione al nemico, facendogli consumare
più PP.
flavor_text.en:
By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it
raises their PP usage.
flavor_text.ja:
プレッシャーを　あたえて
相手の　使う　技の　ＰＰを
多く　減らす。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
给予对手压迫感，
大量减少其使用招式的ＰＰ。

effect_entry:
Moves targetting this Pokémon use one extra PP.

This ability stacks if multiple targets have it.  This ability still affects moves that fail or miss.  This ability does not affect ally moves that target either the entire field or just its side, nor this Pokémon's self-targetted moves; it does, however, affect single-targetted ally moves aimed at this Pokémon, ally moves that target all other Pokémon, and opponents' moves that target the entire field.  If this ability raises a move's PP cost above its remaining PP, it will use all remaining PP.

When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.
short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あつい　しぼうで　まもられているので
ほのおタイプと　こおりタイプの
わざの　ダメージを　はんげんさせる。
flavor_text.ko:
두꺼운 지방으로 보호되고 있어
불꽃타입과 얼음타입의
기술의 데미지를 반감시킨다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
被厚厚的脂肪保護著，
能夠讓火屬性和冰屬性
招式的傷害減半。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon est protégé par une épaisse couche
de graisse qui diminue de moitié les dégâts qu’il
subit des capacités de types Feu et Glace.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon wird von einer dicken Fettschicht
geschützt, was den durch Feuer- und Eis-Attacken
erlittenen Schaden halbiert.
flavor_text.es:
Gracias a la gruesa capa de grasa que lo protege,
reduce a la mitad el daño recibido por ataques de
tipo Fuego y Hielo.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon è protetto da uno spesso strato
di grasso che dimezza il danno causato da
mosse di tipo Fuoco e Ghiaccio.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat,
which halves the damage taken from Fire- and
Ice-type moves.
flavor_text.ja:
厚い　脂肪で　守られているので
ほのおタイプと　こおりタイプの
技の　ダメージを　半減させる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为被厚厚的脂肪保护着，
会让火属性和冰属性的招式伤害减半。

effect_entry: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire- and ice-type moves.
short_effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ねむり　じょうたいに　なっても
２ばいの　はやさで
めざめる　ことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
잠듦 상태가 되어도
2배 스피드로
깨어날 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
即使陷入睡眠狀態，
也能以２倍的速度提早醒來。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon se réveille deux fois plus rapidement
que les autres.
flavor_text.de:
Wenn es eingeschlafen ist, kann es doppelt so
schnell wieder aufwachen wie andere Pokémon.
flavor_text.es:
Si el Pokémon se duerme, tardará la mitad de tiempo
en despertarse.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon impiega metà del tempo per risvegliarsi
dal sonno rispetto agli altri.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other
Pokémon from sleep.
flavor_text.ja:
ねむり状態に　なっても
２倍の　早さで
目覚める　ことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
即使变为睡眠状态，
也能以２倍的速度提早醒来。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1.

If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.
short_effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じぶんに　さわった　あいてを
やけど　じょうたいに　する　ことがある。
flavor_text.ko:
자신과 접촉한 상대를
화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
有時會讓接觸到自己的
對手陷入灼傷狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Peut brûler l’attaquant lorsque le Pokémon subit
une attaque directe.
flavor_text.de:
Fügt dem Angreifer bei Berührung eventuell
Verbrennungen zu.
flavor_text.es: Puede quemar al mínimo contacto.
flavor_text.it:
Al contatto subito, chi sferra l’attacco può venire
scottato.
flavor_text.en: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
flavor_text.ja:
自分に　触った　相手を
やけど状態に　する　ことがある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
有时会让接触到自己的
对手变为灼伤状态。

effect_entry:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being burned.

Overworld: If any Pokémon in the party has this ability, each egg in the party has its hatch counter decreased by 2 (rather than 1) each step cycle, making eggs hatch roughly twice as quickly.  This effect does not stack if multiple Pokémon have this ability or magma armor.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
やせいの　ポケモンから
かならず　にげられる。
flavor_text.ko:
야생 포켓몬으로부터
반드시 도망칠 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
一定能從野生寶可夢
那裡逃走。
flavor_text.fr: Permet de fuir n’importe quel Pokémon sauvage.
flavor_text.de: Die Flucht vor wilden Pokémon gelingt immer.
flavor_text.es: Permite escapar de todos los Pokémon salvajes.
flavor_text.it: Garantisce la fuga dai Pokémon selvatici.
flavor_text.en: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
flavor_text.ja:
野生の　ポケモンから
必ず　逃げられる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
一定能从野生宝可梦
那儿逃走。

effect_entry: This Pokémon is always successful fleeing from wild battles, even if trapped by a move or ability.
short_effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
するどい　めの　おかげで
めいちゅうりつを　さげられない。
flavor_text.ko:
날카로운 눈 덕분에
명중률이 떨어지지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
靠著銳利的目光，
命中率不會被降低。
flavor_text.fr:
Les yeux perçants du Pokémon empêchent
sa Précision de baisser.
flavor_text.de:
Sein scharfer Blick hindert Angreifer daran,
seine Genauigkeit zu senken.
flavor_text.es:
La aguda vista de este Pokémon evita que disminuya
su Precisión.
flavor_text.it:
La vista acuta del Pokémon impedisce che la sua
precisione diminuisca.
flavor_text.en:
Keen eyes prevent other Pokémon from lowering this
Pokémon’s accuracy.
flavor_text.ja:
鋭い　目の　おかげで
命中率を　下げられない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
多亏了锐利的目光，
命中率不会被降低。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot have its accuracy lowered.

This ability does not prevent any accuracy losses other than stat modifiers, such as the accuracy cut from fog; nor does it prevent other Pokémon's evasion from making this Pokémon's moves less accurate.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative accuracy modifiers through heart swap.

Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.
short_effect: Prevents accuracy from being lowered.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ちからじまんの　ハサミを　もっているので
あいてに　こうげきを　さげられない。
flavor_text.ko:
힘이 자랑인 집게를 가지고 있어
상대가 공격을 떨어뜨리지 못한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因為擁有以力量為傲的鉗子，
不會被對手降低攻擊。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon est armé de lames tranchantes qui font
sa fierté et empêchent son Attaque de baisser.
flavor_text.de:
Hindert Angreifer durch mächtige Scheren daran,
den Angriffs-Wert zu senken.
flavor_text.es: Evita que el rival le baje el Ataque.
flavor_text.it:
L’Attacco del Pokémon non può diminuire
grazie alla morsa micidiale in cui è in grado
di stringere i nemici.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They
prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.
flavor_text.ja:
力自慢の　ハサミを　持っているので
相手に　攻撃を　下げられない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为拥有以力量自豪的钳子，
不会被对手降低攻击。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's Attack cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.

This ability does not prevent any Attack losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Attack cut from a burn.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative Attack modifiers through heart swap or power swap.
short_effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　つかった　どうぐを
ひろってくることが　ある。
ぼうけんちゅうも　ひろってくる。
flavor_text.ko:
상대가 사용한 도구를
주워올 때가 있다.
모험 중에도 주워온다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
有時會撿來對手用過的道具。
冒險過程中也會撿來。
flavor_text.fr:
Permet parfois au Pokémon de ramasser les objets
que ses ennemis ont utilisés. Il lui arrive aussi d’en
trouver hors des combats.
flavor_text.de:
Hebt gelegentlich von Gegnern benutzte Items auf.
Dies geschieht nicht nur während Kämpfen, sondern
auch unterwegs.
flavor_text.es:
El Pokémon puede recoger objetos que el rival haya
usado, o bien otros que encuentre en plena aventura.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon a volte trova lo strumento usato da
un nemico durante la lotta. Permette di trovare
degli strumenti anche durante l’avventura.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing
Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items
outside of battle, too.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　使った　道具を
拾ってくることが　ある。
冒険中も　拾ってくる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
有时会捡来对手用过的道具，
冒险过程中也会捡到。

effect_entry:
At the end of each turn, if another Pokémon consumed or Flung a held item that turn, this Pokémon picks up the item if it is not already holding one.  After each battle, this Pokémon has a 10% chance of picking up an item if it is not already holding one.

The air balloon and eject button cannot be picked up.

The items that may be found vary by game, and, since Pokémon Emerald, by the Pokémon's level.  This ability is checked after the battle ends, at which point any temporary ability changes have worn off.
short_effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
わざを　だすと
つぎの　ターンは　やすんでしまう。
flavor_text.ko:
기술을 사용하면
다음 턴은 쉰다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
如果使出招式，
下一回合就需要休息。
flavor_text.fr:
Lorsque le Pokémon utilise une capacité, il passe
le tour suivant à paresser.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon muss nach Einsatz einer Attacke
eine Runde lang aussetzen.
flavor_text.es:
Al ejecutar un movimiento, el Pokémon descansará
en el turno siguiente.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon usa una mossa, nel turno
successivo si riposerà.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon can’t use a move the following turn if it
uses one.
flavor_text.ja:
技を　出すと
つぎの　ターンは　休んでしまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
如果使出招式，
下一回合就会休息。

effect_entry:
Every second turn on which this Pokémon should attempt to use a move, it will instead do nothing ("loaf around").

Loafing around interrupts moves that take multiple turns the same way paralysis, flinching, etc do.  Most such moves, for example bide or rollout, are simply cut off upon loafing around.  Attacks with a recharge turn, such as hyper beam, do not have to recharge; attacks with a preparation turn, such as fly, do not end up being used.  Moves that are forced over multiple turns and keep going through failure, such as outrage, uproar, or any move forced by encore, keep going as usual.

If this Pokémon is confused, its confusion is not checked when loafing around; the Pokémon cannot hurt itself, and its confusion does not end or come closer to ending.

If this Pokémon attempts to move but fails, e.g. because of paralysis or gravity, it still counts as having moved and will loaf around the next turn.  If it does not attempt to move, e.g. because it is asleep or frozen, whatever it would have done will be postponed until its next attempt; that is, it will either loaf around or move as usual, depending on what it last did.

This ability cannot be changed with worry seed, but it can be disabled with gastro acid, changed with role play, or traded away with skill swap.
short_effect: Skips every second turn.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じぶんの　こうげきが　たかくなるが
めいちゅうりつが　さがる。
flavor_text.ko:
자신의 공격이 높아지지만
명중률이 떨어진다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
自己的攻擊雖會變高，
但命中率會降低。
flavor_text.fr:
Améliore l’Attaque du Pokémon mais diminue
la Précision.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht den Angriffs-Wert, aber senkt die
Genauigkeit.
flavor_text.es: Aumenta el Ataque, pero reduce la Precisión.
flavor_text.it: Aumenta l’Attacco, ma diminuisce la precisione.
flavor_text.en: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
flavor_text.ja:
自分の　攻撃が　高くなるが
命中率が　下がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
自己的攻击变高，
但命中率会降低。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's physical moves do 1.5× as much regular damage, but have 0.8× their usual accuracy.

Special moves are unaffected.  Moves that do set damage, such as seismic toss, have their accuracy affected, but not their damage.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.
short_effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じぶんに　さわった　あいてを
メロメロに　することが　ある。
flavor_text.ko:
자신과 접촉한 상대를
헤롱헤롱 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
有時會讓接觸到自己的對手
陷入著迷狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Peut séduire l’attaquant lorsque le Pokémon subit
une attaque directe.
flavor_text.de:
Wird dieses Pokémon durch eine direkte Attacke
angegriffen, verliebt sich der Gegner in es.
flavor_text.es:
Entrar en contacto con el Pokémon puede causar
enamoramiento.
flavor_text.it:
Può causare infatuazione a chi manda a segno
un attacco diretto.
flavor_text.en: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
flavor_text.ja:
自分に　触った　相手を
メロメロに　することが　ある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 有时会让接触到自己的对手着迷。

effect_entry:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.

Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
プラスか　マイナスの　とくせいを　もつ
ポケモンが　なかまに　いると
じぶんの　とくこうが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
플러스나 마이너스의 특성을 가진
포켓몬이 동료에 있으면
자신의 특수공격이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
場上的夥伴之中，
如果有正電或負電特性的寶可夢，
自己的特攻會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
L’Attaque Spéciale du Pokémon augmente
si un Pokémon allié a le talent Minus ou Plus.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht den Spezial-Angriff, wenn das Pokémon einen
Mitstreiter mit der Fähigkeit Plus oder Minus hat.
flavor_text.es:
Potencia el Ataque Especial si un Pokémon aliado
tiene la habilidad Más o Menos.
flavor_text.it:
Aumenta l’Attacco Speciale se ci sono
alleati con l’abilità Meno o Più.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally
with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
flavor_text.ja:
プラスか　マイナスの　特性を　持つ
ポケモンが　仲間に　いると
自分の　特攻が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场的伙伴之间
如果有正电或负电特性的宝可梦，
自己的特攻会提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack if any friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  If either ability is disabled by gastro acid, both lose their effect.
short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
プラスか　マイナスの　とくせいを　もつ
ポケモンが　なかまに　いると
じぶんの　とくこうが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
플러스나 마이너스의 특성을 가진
포켓몬이 동료에 있으면
자신의 특수공격이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
場上的夥伴之中，
如果有正電或負電特性的寶可夢，
自己的特攻會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
L’Attaque Spéciale du Pokémon augmente
si un Pokémon allié a le talent Minus ou Plus.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht den Spezial-Angriff, wenn das Pokémon einen
Mitstreiter mit der Fähigkeit Plus oder Minus hat.
flavor_text.es:
Potencia el Ataque Especial si un Pokémon aliado
tiene la habilidad Más o Menos.
flavor_text.it:
Aumenta l’Attacco Speciale se ci sono
alleati con l’abilità Meno o Più.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon if an ally
with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.
flavor_text.ja:
プラスか　マイナスの　特性を　持つ
ポケモンが　仲間に　いると
自分の　特攻が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场的伙伴之间
如果有正电或负电特性的宝可梦，
自己的特攻会提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack if any friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  If either ability is disabled by gastro acid, both lose their effect.
short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきの　えいきょうを　うけて
みずタイプ　ほのおタイプ　こおりタイプの
どれかに　へんかする。
flavor_text.ko:
날씨의 영향을 받아
물타입, 불꽃타입, 얼음타입 중
하나로 변화한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
在天氣的影響下，
會變成水屬性、火屬性
或冰屬性之中的一種。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon prend le type Eau, Feu ou Glace
en fonction de la météo.
flavor_text.de:
Nimmt je nach Wetter entweder den Typ Wasser,
Feuer oder Eis an.
flavor_text.es:
Cambia a tipo Agua, Fuego o Hielo en función del
tiempo atmosférico.
flavor_text.it:
Cambia il tipo del Pokémon in Acqua, Fuoco
o Ghiaccio in base alle condizioni atmosferiche.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change
its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.
flavor_text.ja:
天気の　影響を　受けて
みずタイプ　ほのおタイプ　こおりタイプの
どれかに　変化する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受天气的影响，
会变为水属性、火属性
或冰属性中的某一个。

effect_entry:
During rain, strong sunlight, or hail, this Pokémon's type changes to water, fire, or ice, respectively, and its form changes to match.

This ability has no effect for any Pokémon other than castform.

If the weather ends or becomes anything that does not trigger this ability, or a Pokémon with air lock or cloud nine enters battle, this Pokémon's type and form revert to their default.  If this ability is lost or disabled, this Pokémon cannot change its current type and form until it regains its ability.
short_effect: Changes castform's type and form to match the weather.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ねんちゃくしつの　からだに
どうぐが　くっついているため
あいてに　どうぐを　うばわれない。
flavor_text.ko:
점착질의 몸에
도구가 달라붙어 있어
상대에게 도구를 뺏기지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
道具會黏在
具有黏性的身體上，
不會被對手奪走。
flavor_text.fr:
Les objets sont collés au corps gluant du Pokémon,
ce qui empêche ses adversaires de les dérober.
flavor_text.de:
Trägt es ein Item, bleibt dieses an seinem klebrigen
Körper haften, wodurch Item-Diebstahl verhindert
wird.
flavor_text.es:
Protege al Pokémon del robo de objetos al quedarse
pegados a su cuerpo.
flavor_text.it:
Gli strumenti restano appiccicati al corpo adesivo
del Pokémon e non possono essere rubati.
flavor_text.en:
Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and
cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
flavor_text.ja:
粘着質の　体に
道具が　くっついているため
相手に　道具を　奪われない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为道具是粘在黏性身体上的，
所以不会被对手夺走。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's hold item cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

Damaging moves that would remove this Pokémon's item can still inflict damage against this Pokémon, e.g. knock off or pluck.  This Pokémon can still use moves that involve the loss of its own item, e.g. fling or trick.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the encounter rate while fishing is increased.
short_effect: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
からだの　かわを　ぬぎすてることで
じょうたい　いじょうを
なおすことが　ある。
flavor_text.ko:
몸의 껍질을 벗어 던져
상태 이상을
회복할 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
透過蛻去身上的皮，
有時會治癒異常狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon soigne parfois ses altérations de statut
en muant.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon befreit sich eventuell von
Statusproblemen, indem es seine Haut abstreift.
flavor_text.es:
El Pokémon puede curar sus problemas de estado
al mudar la piel.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon può guarire dai problemi di stato
facendo la muta completa della pelle.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions
by shedding its skin.
flavor_text.ja:
体の　皮を　脱ぎ捨てることで
状態異常を
治すことが　ある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
通过蜕去身上的皮，
有时会治愈异常状态。

effect_entry: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.
short_effect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じょうたい　いじょうに　なると
こんじょうを　だして
こうげきが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
상태 이상이 되면
근성을 보여서
공격이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
陷入異常狀態時，
會拿出毅力，
攻擊會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente l’Attaque du Pokémon s’il est affecté
par une altération de statut.
flavor_text.de:
Bei Statusproblemen setzt es Adrenalin frei und
erhöht so seinen Angriffs-Wert.
flavor_text.es:
Si sufre un problema de estado, se viene arriba y
aumenta su Ataque.
flavor_text.it:
Se è affetto da un problema di stato, il Pokémon
tira fuori la grinta e aumenta il proprio Attacco.
flavor_text.en:
It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts
the Pokémon’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.ja:
状態異常に　なると
根性を　だして
攻撃が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
如果变为异常状态，
会拿出毅力，
攻击会提高。

effect_entry:
Whenever this Pokémon is asleep, burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, it has 1.5× its Attack.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Attack cut from a burn.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
short_effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じょうたい　いじょうに　なると
ふしぎなうろこが　はんのうして
ぼうぎょが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
상태 이상이 되면
이상한 비늘이 반응해서
방어가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
陷入異常狀態時，
神奇鱗片會發生反應，
防禦會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Les écailles mystérieuses du Pokémon réagissent
aux altérations de statut en augmentant sa Défense.
flavor_text.de:
Bei Statusproblemen schützt es sich mit mysteriösen
Schuppen und erhöht so seine Verteidigung.
flavor_text.es:
Sube la Defensa si el Pokémon sufre un problema de
estado.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon è affetto da un problema di stato,
le squame sulla sua pelle si induriscono aumentando
la sua Difesa.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost the Defense
stat if it has a status condition.
flavor_text.ja:
状態異常に　なると
不思議なウロコが　反応して
防御が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
如果变为异常状态，
神奇鳞片会发生反应，
防御会提高。

effect_entry:
Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Defense.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
short_effect: Increases Defense to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ヘドロえきを　すいとった　あいては
きょうれつな　あくしゅうで
ダメージを　うけて　ＨＰを　へらす。
flavor_text.ko:
해감액을 흡수한 상대는
강렬한 악취로
데미지를 받아 HP가 줄어든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
吸收了污泥漿的對手
會因為強烈的惡臭而
使得ＨＰ減少。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon suinte un liquide toxique qui blesse
tous ceux qui tentent de voler ses PV.
flavor_text.de:
Angreifer, die durch Saug-Attacken Kloakensoße
in sich aufgenommen haben, nehmen durch deren
widerwärtigen Gestank Schaden.
flavor_text.es:
Debido a su intenso hedor, hiere a los Pokémon que
intentan drenarle los PS.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon secerne delle sostanze tossiche.
Se un nemico manda a segno una mossa che
assorbe i PS, subisce dei danni.
flavor_text.en:
Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages
attackers using any draining move.
flavor_text.ja:
ヘドロ液を　吸い取った　相手は
強烈な　悪臭で
ダメージを　受けて　ＨＰを　減らす。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
吸收了污泥浆的对手
会因强烈的恶臭
而受到伤害，减少ＨＰ。

effect_entry:
Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain.

dream eater is unaffected.
short_effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ＨＰが　へったとき
くさタイプの　わざの
いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
HP가 줄었을 때
풀타입 기술의
위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
ＨＰ減少的時候，
草屬性的招式威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités de type Plante
du Pokémon quand il a perdu une certaine quantité
de PV.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Stärke von Pflanzen-Attacken,
wenn die KP auf einen gewissen Wert fallen.
flavor_text.es:
Potencia los movimientos de tipo Planta del Pokémon
cuando le quedan pocos PS.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon ha pochi PS, la potenza delle
sue mosse di tipo Erba aumenta.
flavor_text.en:
Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokémon’s
HP is low.
flavor_text.ja:
ＨＰが　減ったとき
くさタイプの　技の
威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
ＨＰ减少的时候，
草属性的招式威力会提高。

effect_entry: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
short_effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ＨＰが　へったとき
ほのおタイプの　わざの
いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
HP가 줄었을 때
불꽃타입 기술의
위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
ＨＰ減少的時候，
火屬性的招式威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités de type Feu
du Pokémon quand il a perdu une certaine quantité
de PV.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Stärke von Feuer-Attacken,
wenn die KP auf einen gewissen Wert fallen.
flavor_text.es:
Potencia los movimientos de tipo Fuego del Pokémon
cuando le quedan pocos PS.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon ha pochi PS, la potenza delle
sue mosse di tipo Fuoco aumenta.
flavor_text.en:
Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP
is low.
flavor_text.ja:
ＨＰが　減ったとき
ほのおタイプの　技の
威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
ＨＰ减少的时候，
火属性的招式威力会提高。

effect_entry: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its fire-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
short_effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ＨＰが　へったとき
みずタイプの　わざの
いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
HP가 줄었을 때
물타입 기술의
위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
ＨＰ減少的時候，
水屬性的招式威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités de type Eau
du Pokémon quand il a perdu une certaine quantité
de PV.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Stärke von Wasser-Attacken,
wenn die KP auf einen gewissen Wert fallen.
flavor_text.es:
Potencia los movimientos de tipo Agua del Pokémon
cuando le quedan pocos PS.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon ha pochi PS, la potenza delle
sue mosse di tipo Acqua aumenta.
flavor_text.en:
Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s
HP is low.
flavor_text.ja:
ＨＰが　減ったとき
みずタイプの　技の
威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
ＨＰ减少的时候，
水属性的招式威力会提高。

effect_entry: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
short_effect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ＨＰが　へったとき
むしタイプの　わざの
いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
HP가 줄었을 때
벌레타입 기술의
위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
ＨＰ減少的時候，
蟲屬性的招式威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités de type
Insecte du Pokémon quand il a perdu une certaine
quantité de PV.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Stärke von Käfer-Attacken,
wenn die KP auf einen gewissen Wert fallen.
flavor_text.es:
Potencia los movimientos de tipo Bicho del Pokémon
cuando le quedan pocos PS.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon ha pochi PS, la potenza delle
sue mosse di tipo Coleottero aumenta.
flavor_text.en:
Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP
is low.
flavor_text.ja:
ＨＰが　減ったとき
むしタイプの　技の
威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
ＨＰ减少的时候，
虫属性的招式威力会提高。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.
short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
はんどうを　うける　わざを　だしても
ＨＰが　へらない。
flavor_text.ko:
반동을 받는 기술을 사용해도
HP가 줄지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
即使使出會受反作用力傷害的招式，
ＨＰ也不會減少。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon peut utiliser des capacités occasionnant
un contrecoup sans perdre de PV.
flavor_text.de:
Verhindert Schaden, der durch Rückstoß entstehen
würde.
flavor_text.es:
Impide que el Pokémon se dañe con sus propios
movimientos.
flavor_text.it: Protegge il Pokémon dai contraccolpi.
flavor_text.en: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
flavor_text.ja:
反動を　受ける　技を　出しても
ＨＰが　減らない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
即使使出会受反作用力伤害的招式，
ＨＰ也不会减少。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon does not receive recoil damage from its recoil moves.

struggle's recoil is unaffected.  This ability does not prevent crash damage from missing with jump kick or high jump kick.
short_effect: Protects against recoil damage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
とうじょう　したときに
てんきを　はれに　する。
flavor_text.ko:
등장했을 때
날씨를 맑음으로 만든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
出場時，
會將天氣變為晴朗。
flavor_text.fr:
Le soleil se met à briller quand le Pokémon
entre au combat.
flavor_text.de: Erzeugt bei Kampfantritt gleißendes Sonnenlicht.
flavor_text.es:
Cuando el Pokémon entra en combate, el tiempo pasa
a ser soleado.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, la luce solare
diventa intensa.
flavor_text.en:
Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters
a battle.
flavor_text.ja:
登場　したときに
天気を　晴れに　する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场时，
会将天气变为晴朗。

effect_entry:
The weather changes to strong sunlight when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.

If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, sand stream, or snow warning are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.
short_effect: Summons strong sunlight that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
せんとうで　あいてを
にげられなくする。
flavor_text.ko:
배틀에서 상대를
도망칠 수 없게 한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 在戰鬥中讓對手無法逃走。
flavor_text.fr: Empêche l’ennemi de s’enfuir.
flavor_text.de: Hindert den Gegner im Kampf an der Flucht.
flavor_text.es: Evita que el rival huya.
flavor_text.it: Impedisce la fuga al nemico.
flavor_text.en: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.
flavor_text.ja:
戦闘で　相手を
逃げられなくする。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 在战斗中让对手无法逃走。

effect_entry:
While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.  flying-type Pokémon and Pokémon in the air, e.g. due to levitate or magnet rise, are unaffected.

Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.
short_effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.  Eluded by flying-types and Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
やるきを　だすことに　よって
ねむり　じょうたいに　ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
의기양양해져서
잠듦 상태가 되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
透過激發出幹勁，
不會陷入睡眠狀態。
flavor_text.fr: Empêche le Pokémon de s’endormir.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon ist so munter, dass es nicht
einschlafen kann.
flavor_text.es: Su determinación le impide quedarse dormido.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon è talmente vivace che non può
addormentarsi.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents
it from falling asleep.
flavor_text.ja:
やる気を　だすことに　よって
ねむり状態に　ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
通过激发出干劲，
不会变为睡眠状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be asleep.

This causes rest to fail altogether.  If a Pokémon is asleep and acquires this ability, it will immediately wake up; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

This ability functions identically to insomnia in battle.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.
short_effect: Prevents sleep.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
しろいけむりに　まもられて
あいてに　のうりょくを　さげられない。
flavor_text.ko:
하얀 연기의 보호를 받아
상대가 능력을 떨어뜨릴 수 없다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
被白色煙霧保護著，
不會被對手降低能力。
flavor_text.fr:
Un écran de fumée empêche l’ennemi de baisser
les stats du Pokémon.
flavor_text.de:
Indem es sich mit pulvrigem Rauch umhüllt, hindert
es Angreifer daran, seine Statuswerte zu senken.
flavor_text.es:
El humo blanco que lo protege evita que otro
Pokémon le baje las características.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon è protetto da un fumo chiaro che
impedisce ai nemici di diminuire le sue statistiche.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which
prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
flavor_text.ja:
白い煙に　守られて
相手に　能力を　下げられない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
被白色烟雾保护着，
不会被对手降低能力。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot have its stats lowered by other Pokémon.

This ability does not prevent any stat losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Speed cut from paralysis; nor self-inflicted stat drops, such as the Special Attack drop from overheat; nor opponent-triggered stat boosts, such as the Attack boost from swagger.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative stat modifiers through guard swap, heart swap, or power swap.

This ability functions identically to clear body in battle.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
short_effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ヨガの　ちからで
ぶつり　こうげきの　いりょくが
２ばいに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
요가의 힘으로
물리공격의 위력이
2배가 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因瑜伽的力量，
物理攻擊的威力會變為２倍。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon utilise sa maîtrise du yoga pour doubler
la puissance de ses capacités physiques.
flavor_text.de:
Verdoppelt mit reiner Willenskraft die Stärke seiner
physischen Attacken.
flavor_text.es: Duplica la potencia de los ataques físicos.
flavor_text.it:
L’Attacco del Pokémon raddoppia grazie
alla sua padronanza delle tecniche yoga.
flavor_text.en:
Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its
Attack stat.
flavor_text.ja:
ヨガの　力で
物理攻撃の　威力が
２倍に　なる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因瑜伽的力量，
物理攻击的威力会变为２倍。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's Attack is doubled in battle.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

This ability functions identically to huge power.
short_effect: Doubles Attack in battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
かたい　からに　まもられ
あいての　こうげきが
きゅうしょに　あたらない。
flavor_text.ko:
단단한 껍질의 보호를 받아
상대의 공격이
급소에 맞지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
被堅硬的殼保護著，
對手的攻擊不會擊中要害。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon est protégé des coups critiques
par sa carapace.
flavor_text.de:
Wehrt gegnerische Volltreffer mit einem harten
Panzer ab.
flavor_text.es:
La robusta coraza que lo protege bloquea los golpes
críticos.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon è protetto da un guscio robusto
che gli evita di subire brutti colpi.
flavor_text.en: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
flavor_text.ja:
硬い　殻に　守られ
相手の　攻撃が
急所に　当たらない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
被坚硬的壳保护着，
对手的攻击不会击中要害。

effect_entry:
Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.

This ability functions identically to battle armor.
short_effect: Protects against critical hits.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あらゆる　てんきの　えいきょうが
きえて　しまう。
flavor_text.ko:
모든 날씨의 영향이
없어진다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 所有天氣的影響都會消失。
flavor_text.fr: Annule tous les effets de la météo.
flavor_text.de: Hebt alle Wetter-Effekte auf.
flavor_text.es: Neutraliza todos los efectos del tiempo atmosférico.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon non subisce gli effetti di nessuna
condizione atmosferica.
flavor_text.en: Eliminates the effects of weather.
flavor_text.ja:
あらゆる　天気の　影響が
消えて　しまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 所有天气的影响都会消失。

effect_entry:
