While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.

This ability functions identically to cloud nine.
short_effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こんらん　じょうたいの　ときは
かいひりつが　アップする。
flavor_text.ko:
혼란 상태일 때는
회피율이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
陷入混亂狀態時，
閃避率會提高。
flavor_text.fr: Augmente l’Esquive du Pokémon s’il est confus.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht den Fluchtwert, wenn das Pokémon
verwirrt ist.
flavor_text.es: Sube la Evasión si el Pokémon está confuso.
flavor_text.it: Se il Pokémon è confuso, ne aumenta l’elusione.
flavor_text.en: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
flavor_text.ja:
こんらん状態の　ときは
回避率が　アップする。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
在混乱状态时，
闪避率会提高。

effect_entry: When this Pokémon is confused, it has twice its evasion.
short_effect: Doubles evasion when confused.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
でんきタイプの　わざを　うけると
ダメージを　うけずに　
すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
전기타입의 기술을 받으면
데미지를 받지 않고
스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到電屬性的招式攻擊時，
不但不會受到傷害，反而速度會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Si le Pokémon est touché par une capacité Électrik,
il ne subit aucun dégât et sa Vitesse augmente.
flavor_text.de:
Treffer durch Elektro-Attacken verursachen keinen
Schaden, sondern geben dem Pokémon eine
Starthilfe und erhöhen so seine Initiative.
flavor_text.es:
Si le alcanza un movimiento de tipo Eléctrico, le sube
la Velocidad en vez de sufrir daño.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon viene colpito da una mossa di
tipo Elettro, la neutralizza e sfrutta la carica
elettrica per aumentare la propria Velocità.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move,
instead of taking damage.
flavor_text.ja:
でんきタイプの　技を　受けると
ダメージを　受けずに　
素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到电属性的招式攻击时，
不会受到伤害，而是速度会提高。

effect_entry:
Whenever an electric-type move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.

This ability will not take effect if this Pokémon is immune to Electric moves.  Electric moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

This effect includes non-damaging moves, i.e. thunder wave.
short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
せいべつが　おなじだと
とうそうしんを　もやして　つよくなる
せいべつが　ちがうと　よわくなる
flavor_text.ko:
성별이 같으면
투쟁심을 불태워 강해진다.
성별이 다르면 약해진다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
面對性別相同的對手，
會燃起鬥爭心，變得更強。
面對性別不同的對手時則會變弱。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon déteste la concurrence et inflige plus
de dégâts si l’ennemi est du même sexe. Par contre,
il en inflige moins si l’ennemi est du sexe opposé.
flavor_text.de:
Greift es einen Rivalen desselben Geschlechts an,
wird es stärker. Greift es ein Ziel des anderen
Geschlechts an, wird es schwächer.
flavor_text.es:
Si el objetivo es del mismo sexo, su competitividad le
lleva a infligir más daño. Si es del sexo contrario, en
cambio, el daño será menor.
flavor_text.it:
Rende più forti contro nemici dello stesso sesso,
ma più deboli contro nemici di sesso opposto.
flavor_text.en:
Becomes competitive and deals more damage to
Pokémon of the same gender, but deals less to
Pokémon of the opposite gender.
flavor_text.ja:
性別が　同じだと
闘争心を　燃やして　強くなる。
性別が　違うと　弱くなる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
面对性别相同的对手，
会燃起斗争心，变得更强。
而面对性别不同的，则会变弱。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon inflicts 1.25× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the same gender and 0.75× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the opposite gender.

If either Pokémon is genderless, damage is unaffected.
short_effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ひるむ　たびに
ふくつのこころを　もやして
すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
풀죽을 때마다
불굴의 마음을 불태워
스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
每次畏縮時，
不屈之心就會燃起，
速度也會提高。
flavor_text.fr: Augmente la Vitesse du Pokémon quand il a peur.
flavor_text.de:
Sein eiserner Wille erhöht die Initiative, wann immer
das Pokémon zurückschreckt.
flavor_text.es:
Cada vez que retrocede sube su Velocidad, debido
a su voluntad inquebrantable.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon tentenna, il suo animo indomito
si risveglia e la sua Velocità aumenta.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon’s determination boosts the Speed
stat each time the Pokémon flinches.
flavor_text.ja:
ひるむ　たびに
不屈の心を　燃やして
素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
每次畏缩时，
不屈之心就会燃起，
速度也会提高。

effect_entry: Whenever this Pokémon flinches, its Speed rises one stage.
short_effect: Raises Speed one stage upon flinching.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　あられのとき
かいひりつが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
날씨가 싸라기눈일 때
회피율이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣是冰雹時，
閃避率會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente l’Esquive du Pokémon durant les tempêtes
de grêle.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht bei Hagel den Fluchtwert.
flavor_text.es: Sube la Evasión cuando graniza.
flavor_text.it: Aumenta l’elusione quando grandina.
flavor_text.en: Boosts evasion in a hailstorm.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　あられのとき
回避率が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
冰雹天气时，
闪避率会提高。

effect_entry:
During hail, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.

The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.
short_effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ＨＰが　すくなくなったら　たべる
きのみを　ＨＰ　はんぶんの
ときに　たべてしまう。
flavor_text.ko:
HP가 줄어들면 먹을
나무열매를 HP가
절반일 때 먹어버린다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
原本ＨＰ變得很少時才會吃的樹果，
在ＨＰ還有一半時就會把它吃掉。
flavor_text.fr:
Si le Pokémon tient une Baie à manger en cas de PV
bas, il la mange dès qu’il a perdu la moitié de ses PV.
flavor_text.de:
Setzt bestimmte Beeren nicht erst in einer Notlage
ein, sondern bereits dann, wenn seine KP auf die
Hälfte des Maximalwerts fallen.
flavor_text.es:
Cuando sus PS se ven reducidos a la mitad, engulle
la baya que normalmente solo se comería cuando le
quedasen pocos PS.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon non attende di aver perso molti PS
per mangiare certe bacche, ma lo fa non appena
i suoi PS scendono a metà o meno.
flavor_text.en:
Makes the Pokémon eat a held Berry when its HP
drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
flavor_text.ja:
ＨＰが　少なくなったら　食べる
きのみを　ＨＰ　半分の
時に　食べてしまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
原本ＨＰ变得很少时才会吃树果，
在ＨＰ还有一半时就会把它吃掉。

effect_entry: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
short_effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
きゅうしょに　こうげきが　あたると
いかりくるって　こうげきりょくが
さいだいに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
급소에 공격이 맞으면
크게 분노해 공격력이
최대가 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
要害被擊中時會大發雷霆。
攻擊力會提高到最大。
flavor_text.fr:
Si le Pokémon subit un coup critique, il entre
dans une colère noire qui augmente son Attaque
au maximum.
flavor_text.de:
Wird nach Einstecken eines Volltreffers wütend und
maximiert dabei seinen Angriffs-Wert.
flavor_text.es:
Si recibe un golpe crítico, monta en cólera y sube su
Ataque hasta el máximo.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon subisce un brutto colpo, monta su
tutte le furie e il suo Attacco aumenta al massimo.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit,
and that maxes its Attack stat.
flavor_text.ja:
急所に　攻撃が　当たると
怒りくるって　攻撃力が
最大に　なる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
要害被击中时，
会大发雷霆，
攻击力变为最大。

effect_entry:
Whenever this Pokémon receives a critical hit, its Attack rises to the maximum of 6 stages.

This ability will still take effect if the critical hit is received by a substitute.
short_effect: Raises Attack to the maximum of six stages upon receiving a critical hit.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
もっていた　どうぐが　なくなると
すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
지니던 도구가 없어지면
스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
失去所持有的道具時，
速度會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la Vitesse du Pokémon s’il perd ou utilise
l’objet qu’il tenait au début du combat.
flavor_text.de:
Wenn das von ihm getragene Item verwendet wird
oder verloren geht, erhöht dies seine Initiative.
flavor_text.es: Sube la Velocidad si usa o pierde el objeto que lleva.
flavor_text.it:
Aumenta la Velocità dopo aver usato o perso
uno strumento.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon’s held item is 
used or lost.
flavor_text.ja:
持っていた　道具が　なくなると
素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
失去所持有的道具时，
速度会提高。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon uses or loses its held item, its Speed is doubled.  If it gains another item or leaves battle, this bonus is lost.

This includes when the Pokémon drops its item because of knock off.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  There is no notification when this ability takes effect.
short_effect: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
たいねつの　からだに　よって
ほのおタイプの　わざの
ダメージを　はんげんさせる
flavor_text.ko:
내열인 몸으로 인해
불꽃타입 공격의
데미지를 반감한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
靠著耐熱的體質，
讓火屬性的招式威力減半。
flavor_text.fr:
Diminue de moitié les dégâts infligés au Pokémon
par les capacités de type Feu.
flavor_text.de:
Sein Hitze abweisender Körper halbiert den durch
Feuer-Attacken erlittenen Schaden.
flavor_text.es:
Su cuerpo, resistente al calor, reduce a la mitad el
daño recibido por movimientos de tipo Fuego.
flavor_text.it:
Il suo corpo termoresistente dimezza i danni
inflitti dalle mosse di tipo Fuoco.
flavor_text.en:
The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the
damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
flavor_text.ja:
耐熱の　体に　よって
ほのおタイプの　技の
威力を　半減させる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
耐热的体质会
让火属性的招式威力减半。

effect_entry: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire-type moves and burns.
short_effect: Halves damage from fire moves and burns.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
のうりょく　へんかが
いつもの　２ばいに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
능력 변화가
평소의 2배가 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 能力變化會變為平時的２倍。
flavor_text.fr:
Les variations de stats sont deux fois plus
importantes pour le Pokémon.
flavor_text.de:
Verdoppelt die Wirkung eigener
Statusveränderungen.
flavor_text.es: Duplica los cambios en las características.
flavor_text.it: Raddoppia le modifiche alle statistiche.
flavor_text.en: The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
flavor_text.ja:
能力　変化が
いつもの　２倍に　なる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 能力变化会变为平时的２倍。

effect_entry:
Each stage of this Pokémon's stat modifiers acts as two stages.  These doubled stages are still limited to a minimum of -6 and a maximum of 6.

This Pokémon can still accumulate less than -3 or more than 3 stages of stat modifiers, even though the extra ones have no effect after doubling.
short_effect: Doubles the Pokémon's stat modifiers.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　あめのときや　みずタイプの
わざで　ＨＰが　かいふくし　はれのときや
ほのおタイプの　わざで　へってしまう。
flavor_text.ko:
비가 오는 날씨나 물타입의
기술로 HP가 회복되고
맑을 때나 불꽃타입의 기술로는 줄어든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
下雨天氣時和受到水屬性的招式攻擊時，
HP會回復。晴朗天氣時和受到火屬性的
招式攻擊時，ＨＰ會減少。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon regagne des PV sous la pluie ou s’il
est touché par une capacité Eau, mais il déteste
les capacités Feu ou quand le soleil brille.
flavor_text.de:
Bei Sonnenschein verliert das Pokémon KP und der
Schaden durch Feuer-Attacken steigt. Bei Regen und
Treffern durch Wasser-Attacken regeneriert es KP.
flavor_text.es:
Pierde PS si hace sol y los recupera si llueve o recibe
un movimiento de tipo Agua. Los movimientos de tipo
Fuego, por su parte, le hacen más daño de lo normal.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon recupera PS se piove o se subisce
mosse di tipo Acqua, ma con la luce solare intensa
perde PS. Subisce più danni da mosse di tipo Fuoco.
flavor_text.en:
Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type
moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases
the damage received from Fire-type moves.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　雨の時や　みずタイプの
技で　ＨＰが　回復し　はれの時や
ほのおタイプの　技で　減ってしまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
下雨天气时和受到水属性的招式时，
ＨＰ会回复。晴朗天气时和受到火属性的
招式时，ＨＰ会减少。

effect_entry: This Pokémon takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn during strong sunlight, but it heals for 1/8 of its HP each turn during rain.  This Pokémon takes 1.25× as much damage from fire-type moves, but whenever a water move hits it, it heals for 1/4 its maximum HP instead.
short_effect: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　ぼうぎょと　とくぼうを　くらべて
ひくい　ほうの　のうりょくに　あわせて
じぶんの　こうげきか　とくこうを　あげる。
flavor_text.ko:
상대의 방어와 특수방어를 비교해서
낮은 쪽 능력에 맞춰서
자신의 공격이나 특수공격을 올린다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
比較對手的防禦和特防，
根據較低的那項能力
相應地提高自己的攻擊或特攻。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon compare la Défense et la Défense
Spéciale de l’adversaire et augmente son Attaque
ou son Attaque Spéciale en conséquence.
flavor_text.de:
Ist die Spezial-Verteidigung des Gegners höher als
seine Verteidigung, wird der eigene Spezial-Angriff
erhöht. Ist die Verteidigung höher, steigt der Angriff.
flavor_text.es:
Compara la Defensa y la Defensa Especial del rival
para ver cuál es inferior y aumenta su propio Ataque
o Ataque Especial, según corresponda.
flavor_text.it:
Analizza Difesa e Difesa Speciale del nemico e,
a seconda di qual è più bassa, aumenta il proprio
Attacco o Attacco Speciale.
flavor_text.en:
Compares an opposing Pokémon’s Defense and
Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or
Sp. Atk stat—whichever will be more effective.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　防御と　特防を　くらべて
低い　ほうの　能力に　あわせて
自分の　攻撃か　特攻を　上げる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
比较对手的防御和特防，
根据较低的那项能力
相应地提高自己的攻击或特攻。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon enters battle, its Attack or Special Attack, whichever corresponds to its opponents' weaker total defensive stat, rises one stage.  In the event of a tie, Special Attack is raised.

This ability also takes effect when acquired during a battle.
short_effect: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
パンチを　つかう　わざの
いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
펀치를 사용하는 기술의
위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
使用到拳頭的招式
威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités
coups de poing.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Stärke von Hieb-, Punch-, Faust- und
Schlag-Attacken.
flavor_text.es: Aumenta la potencia de los puñetazos.
flavor_text.it: Potenzia le mosse che utilizzano pugni.
flavor_text.en: Powers up punching moves.
flavor_text.ja:
パンチを　使う　技の
威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 使用拳类招式的威力会提高。

effect_entry:
Moves flagged as being punch-based have 1.2× their base power for this Pokémon.

sucker punch is not flagged as punch-based; its original, Japanese name only means "surprise attack".
short_effect: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
どくじょうたいに　なると
ＨＰが　へらずに　ふえていく。
flavor_text.ko:
독 상태가 되면
HP가 줄지 않고 증가한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
陷入中毒狀態時，
ＨＰ不會減少，反而會漸漸增加。
flavor_text.fr:
Quand le Pokémon est empoisonné, il regagne des PV
au lieu d’en perdre.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon erleidet keinen Schaden durch
Vergiftung, sondern regeneriert KP.
flavor_text.es:
Si el Pokémon resulta envenenado, recupera PS en
vez de perderlos.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon recupera PS anziché perderli
se è avvelenato.
flavor_text.en:
Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned, instead of
losing HP.
flavor_text.ja:
どく状態に　なると
ＨＰが　減らずに　増えていく。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
变为中毒状态时，
ＨＰ不会减少，反而会增加起来。

effect_entry: If this Pokémon is poisoned, it will heal for 1/8 of its maximum HP after each turn rather than taking damage.  This includes bad poison.
short_effect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じぶんと　おなじ　タイプの
わざの　いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
자신과 같은 타입의
기술 위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
與自身同屬性的招式
威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Quand le Pokémon utilise une capacité du même type
que lui, le bonus de puissance qu’elle reçoit
est encore plus important que normalement.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Stärke von Attacken, die dem Typ des
Pokémon entsprechen.
flavor_text.es:
Potencia aún más los movimientos cuyo tipo coincida
con el del Pokémon.
flavor_text.it:
Potenzia di molto le mosse dello stesso tipo
del Pokémon.
flavor_text.en: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
flavor_text.ja:
自分と　おなじ　タイプの
技の　威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
与自身同属性的招式
威力会提高。

effect_entry: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.
short_effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
れんぞくわざを　つかうと　いつも
さいこう　かいすう　だすことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
연속 기술을 사용하면 항상
최고 횟수를 사용할 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
若使用連續招式，
總是可使出最高次數。
flavor_text.fr:
Les capacités pouvant frapper plusieurs fois
frappent toujours le nombre maximum de coups.
flavor_text.de:
Landet mit Serien-Attacken immer die maximale
Anzahl an Treffern.
flavor_text.es:
Los movimientos múltiples se ejecutarán siempre con
el número máximo de golpes.
flavor_text.it:
Le mosse multicolpo eseguono sempre il massimo
degli attacchi possibili.
flavor_text.en:
Maximizes the number of times multi-strike
moves hit.
flavor_text.ja:
連続技を　使うと　いつも
最高回数　出すことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
如果使用连续招式，
总是能使出最高次数。

effect_entry: This Pokémon always hits five times with two-to-five-hit moves, such as icicle spear.  It also bypasses the accuracy checks on triple kick's second and third hits.
short_effect: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and triple kick to their full length every time.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　あめのとき
じょうたい　いじょうが　なおる。
flavor_text.ko:
비가 오는 날씨일 때
상태 이상이 회복된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣為下雨時，
會治癒異常狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Soigne les altérations de statut du Pokémon
quand il pleut.
flavor_text.de: Heilt bei Regen Statusprobleme.
flavor_text.es: Cura los problemas de estado si está lloviendo.
flavor_text.it: Se piove, il Pokémon guarisce dai problemi di stato.
flavor_text.en: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　雨のとき
状態異常が　治る。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
下雨天气时，
异常状态会治愈。

effect_entry: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
short_effect: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　はれると
とくこうが　あがるが
まいターン　ＨＰが　へる。
flavor_text.ko:
날씨가 맑으면
특수공격이 올라가지만
매 턴 HP가 줄어든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
晴朗天氣時特攻會提高，
但每回合ＨＰ會減少。
flavor_text.fr:
Quand le soleil brille, l’Attaque Spéciale du Pokémon
augmente mais il perd des PV à chaque tour.
flavor_text.de:
Führt bei Sonnenschein in jeder Runde zu
KP-Verlusten, erhöht aber den Spezial-Angriff.
flavor_text.es:
Si hace sol, aumenta su Ataque Especial, pero
pierde PS en cada turno.
flavor_text.it:
Se la luce del sole è intensa, l’Attacco Speciale
aumenta, ma il Pokémon perde PS a ogni turno.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP
decreases every turn.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　晴れると
特攻が　上がるが
毎ターン　ＨＰが　減る。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
晴朗天气时，
特攻会提高，
而每回合ＨＰ会减少。

effect_entry: During strong sunlight, this Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack but takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn.
short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じょうたい　いじょうに　なると
すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
상태 이상이 되면
스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
陷入異常狀態時，
速度會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la Vitesse du Pokémon en cas d’altération
de statut.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht bei Statusproblemen die Initiative.
flavor_text.es: Aumenta la Velocidad si sufre problemas de estado.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon è affetto da un problema di stato,
la Velocità aumenta.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a
status condition.
flavor_text.ja:
状態異常に　なると
素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
变为异常状态时，
速度会提高。

effect_entry:
Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
short_effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
どんな　タイプの　わざでも
すべて　ノーマルタイプに　なる。
いりょくが　すこし　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
어떤 타입의 기술도
모두 노말타입이 된다.
위력이 조금 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
無論是什麼屬性的招式，
全部都會變為一般屬性。
威力會少量提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Toutes les capacités du Pokémon deviennent de
type Normal, quel que soit leur type original.
Leur puissance augmente légèrement.
flavor_text.de:
Alle Attacken des Pokémon nehmen den Typ Normal
an und ihre Stärke erhöht sich ein wenig.
flavor_text.es:
Todos los movimientos se vuelven de tipo Normal y
aumentan ligeramente su potencia.
flavor_text.it:
Tutte le mosse del Pokémon diventano di tipo
Normale e la loro potenza aumenta un po’.
flavor_text.en:
All the Pokémon’s moves become Normal type.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
flavor_text.ja:
どんな　タイプの　技でも
すべて　ノーマルタイプに　なる。
威力が　少し　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
无论是什么属性的招式，
全部会变为一般属性。
威力会少量提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's moves all act as if they were normal-type.

Moves that inflict typeless damage do so as usual.  Moves of variable type, such as hidden power, are affected.  They otherwise work as usual, however; weather ball, for example, is always forced to be Normal, but it still has doubled power and looks different during weather.

As thunder wave is prevented by immunities, unlike most non-damaging moves, it does not affect ghost-type Pokémon under the effect of this ability.
short_effect: Makes the Pokémon's moves all act normal-type.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうげきを　きゅうしょに　あてると
いりょくが　さらに　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
공격을 급소에 맞혔을 때
위력이 더욱 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
擊中要害時，
威力會進一步提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Lorsque le Pokémon porte un coup critique,
les dégâts infligés augmentent encore plus
que d’habitude.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht bei Volltreffern die Stärke der Attacke noch
weiter.
flavor_text.es: Potencia los golpes críticos aún más de lo normal.
flavor_text.it: Aumenta ulteriormente i danni inflitti dai brutti colpi.
flavor_text.en:
Powers up moves if they become critical hits
when attacking.
flavor_text.ja:
攻撃を　急所に　当てると
威力が　さらに　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
击中要害时，
威力会变得更强。

effect_entry: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.
short_effect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうげき　いがいでは
ダメージを　うけない。
flavor_text.ko:
공격 이외에는
데미지를 입지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 不會受到攻擊以外的傷害。
flavor_text.fr: Seules les attaques peuvent blesser le Pokémon.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon nimmt nur durch Offensiv-Attacken
Schaden.
flavor_text.es: El Pokémon solo recibe daño de ataques.
flavor_text.it: Il Pokémon subisce danni solo dagli attacchi.
flavor_text.en: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
flavor_text.ja:
攻撃　以外では
ダメージを　受けない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 不会受到攻击以外的伤害。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon is immune to damage not directly caused by a move.

For example, this Pokémon takes no damage from from weather, recoil, status ailments, or spikes, but it still suffers from the Attack cut when burned, and a life orb will still power up this Pokémon's moves without damaging it.  Anything that directly depends on such damage will also not happen; for example, leech seed will neither hurt this Pokémon nor heal the opponent, and Pokémon with a jaboca berry or rowap berry will not consume the berry when hit by this Pokémon.

The following are unaffected: struggle, pain split (whether used by or against this Pokémon), belly drum, substitute, curse, moves that knock the user out, and damage from confusion.

This Pokémon will neither lose nor regain HP if it drains HP from a Pokémon with liquid ooze.

If this Pokémon is badly poisoned, the poison counter is still increased each turn; if the Pokémon loses this ability, it will begin taking as much damage as it would be if it had been taking increasing damage each turn.
short_effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ノーガード　せんぽうに　よって
おたがいの　だす　わざが
かならず　あたる　ようになる。
flavor_text.ko:
노가드전법에 따라
서로가 사용하는 기술이
반드시 맞게 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
由於無防守戰術，
雙方使出的招式都必定會擊中。
flavor_text.fr:
Les capacités du Pokémon touchent l’ennemi
à coup sûr, et vice-versa.
flavor_text.de:
Alle Attacken des oder auf das Pokémon gelingen
aufgrund seiner deckungslosen Kampftaktik.
flavor_text.es:
Al quedar ambos expuestos, tanto los movimientos
del Pokémon como los del rival acertarán siempre.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon e chiunque lo attacchi abbassano
la guardia e le loro mosse vanno sempre a segno.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure
incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
flavor_text.ja:
ノーガード戦法に　よって
お互いの　出す　技が
かならず　当たる　ようになる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
由于无防守战术，
双方使出的招式都必定会击中。

effect_entry:
Moves used by or against this Pokémon never miss.

One-hit KO moves are unaffected.  Moves affected by this ability can hit Pokémon during the preparation turn of moves like dig or fly.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.
short_effect: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
わざを　だす　じゅんばんが
かならず　さいごに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
기술을 사용하는 순서가
반드시 마지막이 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
使出招式的順序
必定會變為最後。
flavor_text.fr: Le Pokémon utilise toujours sa capacité en dernier.
flavor_text.de:
Handelt auch mit Initiative-Vorteil stets nach dem
Gegner.
flavor_text.es:
El Pokémon ejecuta su movimiento tras todos los
demás.
flavor_text.it: Il Pokémon agisce sempre per ultimo.
flavor_text.en: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
flavor_text.ja:
技を　出す　順番が
かならず　最後に　なる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
使出招式的顺序
必定会变为最后。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon moves last within its priority bracket.

Multiple Pokémon with this ability move in order of Speed amongst themselves.

The full incense and lagging tail take precedence over this ability; that is, Pokémon with these items move after Pokémon with this ability.  Pokémon with both this ability and one of these items are delayed as much as if they had only the item.

This ability works as usual during trick room: Pokémon with this ability will move in reverse order of Speed after Pokémon without it.
short_effect: Makes the Pokémon move last within its move's priority bracket.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
いりょくが　ひくい　わざの
いりょくを　たかくして　こうげきできる。
flavor_text.ko:
위력이 약한 기술의
위력을 올려서 공격할 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
可讓威力低的招式
提高威力來進行攻擊。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités
les plus faibles.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht die Stärke von schwächeren Attacken.
flavor_text.es: Potencia los movimientos más débiles del Pokémon.
flavor_text.it: Potenzia le mosse più deboli del Pokémon.
flavor_text.en: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.ja:
威力が　低い　技の
威力を　高くして　攻撃できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
攻击时可以将
低威力招式的威力提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's moves have 1.5× their power if their base power is 60 or less.

This includes moves of variable power, such as hidden power and magnitude, when their power is 60 or less.  helping hand's power boost is taken into account for any move, as is defense curl's power boost for rollout.
short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　はれのときは
じょうたい　いじょうに　ならない。
flavor_text.ko:
날씨가 맑을 때는
상태 이상이 되지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣為晴朗時，
不會陷入異常狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Protège le Pokémon contre les altérations de statut
quand le soleil brille.
flavor_text.de: Verhindert bei Sonnenschein Statusprobleme.
flavor_text.es: Evita los problemas de estado si hace sol.
flavor_text.it:
Se la luce del sole è intensa, evita i problemi
di stato.
flavor_text.en: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　晴れのときは
状態異常に　ならない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
晴朗天气时，
不会变为异常状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon cannot be given a major status ailment during strong sunlight.

This ability does not heal prior status ailments.  rest will fail altogether with this ability in effect.  yawn will immediately fail if used on this Pokémon during strong sunlight, and an already-used Yawn will fail if the weather turns to strong sunlight in the meantime.
short_effect: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
もっている　どうぐを
つかうことが　できない。
flavor_text.ko:
지니고 있는 도구를
쓸 수 없다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 無法使用持有的道具。
flavor_text.fr: Le Pokémon ne peut utiliser aucun objet tenu.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon kann keine getragenen Items
verwenden.
flavor_text.es: El Pokémon no puede usar objetos equipados.
flavor_text.it: Il Pokémon non può usare lo strumento che ha.
flavor_text.en: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.
flavor_text.ja:
持っている　道具を
使うことが　できない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 无法使用持有的道具。

effect_entry:
In battle, this Pokémon cannot use its held item, nor will the item have any passive effect on the battle, positive or negative.  This Pokémon also cannot use fling.

The Speed cut from the iron ball and the effort items (the macho brace, power weight, power bracer, power belt, power lens, power band, and power anklet) is unaffected.  Items that do not directly affect the battle, such as the exp share, the amulet coin, or the soothe bell, work as usual.  All held items work as usual out of battle.

Other moves that use the held item, such as natural gift and switcheroo, work as usual.
short_effect: Prevents the Pokémon from using its held item in battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　とくせいに
じゃまされる　ことなく　あいてに
わざを　だすことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
상대 특성에
방해받지 않고 상대에게
기술을 쓸 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
可不受特性影響，
向對手使出招式。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon ignore les talents adverses qui auraient
un effet sur ses capacités.
flavor_text.de:
Attacken können ungeachtet der Fähigkeiten des
Zieles verwendet werden.
flavor_text.es:
Las habilidades del objetivo no afectan a los
movimientos empleados.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon attacca, ignora l’abilità del
bersaglio se questa ha effetto sulle mosse.
flavor_text.en:
Moves can be used on the target regardless of
its Abilities.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　特性に
ジャマされる　ことなく　相手に
技を　出すことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
可以不受对手特性的干扰，
向对手使出招式。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's moves completely ignore abilities that could hinder or prevent their effect on the target.

For example, this Pokémon's moves ignore abilities that would fully negate them, such as water absorb; abilities that would prevent any of their effects, such as clear body, shell armor, or sticky hold; and abilities that grant any general protective benefit, such as simple, snow cloak, or thick fat.  If an ability could either hinder or help this Pokémon's moves, e.g. dry skin or unaware, the ability is ignored either way.

Abilities that do not fit this description, even if they could hinder moves in some other way, are not affected.  For example, cursed body only affects potential future uses of the move, while liquid ooze and shadow tag can only hinder a move's effect on the user.  This ablity cannot ignore type or form changes granted by abilities, for example color change or forecast; nor effects that were caused by abilities but are no longer tied to an ability, such as the rain from drizzle.  This ability cannot ignore multitype at all.

An ability ignored by this ability is only nullified while the move is being used.  For example, this Pokémon's moves can paralyze a Pokémon with limber, but Limber will activate and heal the paralysis immediately thereafter, and this Pokémon's spikes are not affected by this ability after they have been placed.

When this Pokémon enters battle, all participating trainers are notified that it has this ability.

This ability functions identically to teravolt and turboblaze.
short_effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
きょううんを　もっているため
あいての　きゅうしょに
こうげきが　あたりやすい。
flavor_text.ko:
대운을 가지고 있어
상대의 급소에
공격이 맞기 쉽다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因為非常幸運，
容易擊中對手的要害。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon est tellement chanceux qu’il inflige
plus fréquemment des coups critiques.
flavor_text.de:
Großes Glück erhöht die Wahrscheinlichkeit,
einen Volltreffer zu landen.
flavor_text.es:
Su buena suerte aumenta la probabilidad de asestar
golpes críticos.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon ha una fortuna incredibile che aumenta
la sua probabilità di infliggere brutti colpi.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios
of its moves are boosted.
flavor_text.ja:
強運を　持っているため
相手の　急所に
攻撃が　当たりやすい。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
因为拥有超幸运，
攻击容易击中对手的要害。

effect_entry: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.
short_effect: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ひんしに　なったとき
さわった　あいてに
ダメージを　あたえる。
flavor_text.ko:
기절했을 때
접촉한 상대에게
데미지를 준다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
瀕死時，
會對接觸到自己的對手造成傷害。
flavor_text.fr:
Si le Pokémon est mis K.O. par une attaque directe,
il inflige des dégâts à l’attaquant avant de s’évanouir.
flavor_text.de:
Wird das Pokémon durch eine direkte Attacke
besiegt, fügt es dem Angreifer Schaden zu.
flavor_text.es:
Daña al agresor que le ha dado el golpe de gracia
con un movimiento de contacto.
flavor_text.it:
Chi manda KO questo Pokémon con un attacco
diretto subisce dei danni.
flavor_text.en:
Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon
with a finishing hit.
flavor_text.ja:
ひんしに　なったとき
触った　相手に
ダメージを　あたえる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
变为濒死时，
会对接触到自己的对手造成伤害。

effect_entry: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
short_effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　もつ　きけんな　わざを
さっちする　ことができる。
flavor_text.ko:
상대가 지닌 위험한 기술을
감지할 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
察覺對手持有的
危險招式。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon devine si l’adversaire connaît
une capacité dangereuse pour lui.
flavor_text.de: Kann gefährliche Attacken des Gegners erahnen.
flavor_text.es: Prevé los movimientos peligrosos del rival.
flavor_text.it: Rivela se il nemico ha mosse pericolose.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s
dangerous moves.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　持つ　危険な　技を
察知する　ことができる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
可以察觉到
对手拥有的危险招式。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon enters battle, if one of its opponents has a move that is super effective against it, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit knockout move, all participating trainers are notified.

The move itself is not revealed; only that there is such a move.  Moves that inflict typeless damage, such as future sight, and moves of variable type, such as hidden power, count as their listed types.  counter, metal burst, mirror coat, and one-hit KO moves to which this Pokémon is immune do not trigger this ability.
short_effect: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective move, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit KO move.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
とうじょう　したとき
あいての　もつ　わざを
ひとつだけ　よみとる。
flavor_text.ko:
등장했을 때
상대가 지닌 기술을
하나만 꿰뚫어본다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
出場時，預見1個
對手持有的招式。
flavor_text.fr:
Révèle l’une des capacités de l’ennemi quand
le combat commence.
flavor_text.de:
Gibt bei Kampfantritt Auskunft über eine Attacke
aus dem Repertoire des Gegners.
flavor_text.es:
Determina el movimiento más potente del rival al
entrar en combate.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, rivela la mossa
più potente del nemico.
flavor_text.en:
When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of
the moves an opposing Pokémon has.
flavor_text.ja:
登場　したとき
相手の　持つ　技を
ひとつだけ　読み取る。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场时，
只读取１个对手拥有的招式。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals the move with the highest base power known by any opposing Pokémon to all participating trainers.

In the event of a tie, one is chosen at random.

Moves without a listed base power are assigned one as follows:

Power | Moves
----: | -----
  160 | One-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold
  120 | Counter moves: counter, metal burst, and mirror coat
   80 | Variable power or set damage: crush grip, dragon rage, electro ball, endeavor, final gambit, flail, frustration, grass knot, gyro ball, heat crash, heavy slam, hidden power, low kick, natural gift, night shade, psywave, return, reversal, seismic toss, sonic boom, trump card, and wring out
    0 | Any such move not listed
short_effect: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　のうりょくの　へんかを
むしして　こうげきが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
상대의 능력 변화를
무시하고 공격할 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
可無視對手能力的變化，
進行攻擊。
flavor_text.fr:
Quand il attaque, le Pokémon ignore les changements
de stats de l’ennemi.
flavor_text.de:
Greift das Pokémon an, ignoriert es sämtliche
Statusveränderungen des Zieles.
flavor_text.es:
Pasa por alto las mejoras en las características del
rival al atacar.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon attacca, ignora le modifiche
alle statistiche del nemico.
flavor_text.en:
When attacking, the Pokémon ignores the target
Pokémon’s stat changes.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　能力の　変化を
無視して　攻撃が　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
可以无视对手能力的变化，
进行攻击。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for the purposes of damage and accuracy calculation.

Effectively, this affects modifiers of every stat except Speed.

The power of punishment and stored power is calculated as usual.  When this Pokémon hurts itself in confusion, its stat modifiers affect damage as usual.
short_effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうかが　いまひとつの　わざを
つうじょうの　いりょくで
だすことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
효과가 별로인 기술을
통상의 위력으로
쓸 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
可將效果不好的招式
以正常的威力使出。
flavor_text.fr:
Permet à une capacité « pas très efficace »
d’infliger des dégâts comme si elle était efficace
normalement.
flavor_text.de:
Bewirkt, dass nicht sehr effektive Attacken dem Ziel
trotz des Typennachteils normalen Schaden zufügen.
flavor_text.es: Potencia los movimientos que no son muy eficaces.
flavor_text.it:
Permette alle mosse non molto efficaci di infliggere
danni normalmente senza essere penalizzate dalla
compatibilità di tipo sfavorevole.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves
to deal regular damage.
flavor_text.ja:
効果が　いまひとつの　技を
通常の　威力で
出すことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
可以将效果不好的招式
以通常的威力使出。

effect_entry: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
short_effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうかばつぐんに　なってしまう
こうげきの　いりょくを
よわめる　ことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
효과가 굉장한
공격의 위력을
약하게 만든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到效果絕佳的攻擊時，
可減弱其威力。
flavor_text.fr:
Réduit les dégâts subis lorsque le Pokémon
est touché par une capacité super efficace.
flavor_text.de:
Reduziert die Stärke von sehr effektiven Attacken
und verringert damit den Schaden, den das Pokémon
durch sie erleidet.
flavor_text.es:
Mitiga el daño que le infligen los movimientos
supereficaces.
flavor_text.it: Riduce la potenza delle mosse superefficaci subite.
flavor_text.en: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
flavor_text.ja:
効果バツグンに　なってしまう
攻撃の　威力を
弱める　ことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到效果绝佳的攻击时，
可以减弱其威力。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it.

This ability functions identically to solid rock.
short_effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
５ターンの　あいだ
こうげきと　すばやさが
はんぶんに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
5턴 동안
공격과 스피드가
절반이 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
在５回合內，
攻擊和速度會減半。
flavor_text.fr:
Divise la Vitesse et l’Attaque du Pokémon par deux
pendant les cinq premiers tours du combat.
flavor_text.de:
Halbiert fünf Runden lang den Angriffs-Wert und die
Initiative des Pokémon.
flavor_text.es:
Baja a la mitad el Ataque y la Velocidad durante
cinco turnos.
flavor_text.it: Dimezza per cinque turni l’Attacco e la Velocità.
flavor_text.en:
For five turns, the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed
stats are halved.
flavor_text.ja:
５ターンの　あいだ
攻撃と　素早さが
半分に　なる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
在５回合内，
攻击和速度减半。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's Attack and Speed are halved for five turns upon entering battle.

This ability also takes effect when acquired during battle.  If this Pokémon loses its ability before the five turns are up, its Attack and Speed return to normal; if it then regains this ability without leaving battle, its Attack and Speed are halved again, but the counter keeps counting from where it was.
short_effect: Halves Attack and Speed for five turns upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ゴーストタイプの　ポケモンに
ノーマルタイプと　かくとうタイプの
わざを　あてることが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
고스트타입 포켓몬에게
노말타입과 격투타입의
기술을 맞게 한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
一般屬性和格鬥屬性的招式
可擊中幽靈屬性的寶可夢。
flavor_text.fr:
Permet aux capacités de type Normal ou Combat
du Pokémon de toucher les Pokémon de type
Spectre.
flavor_text.de:
Bewirkt, dass Normal- und Kampf-Attacken auch
Pokémon vom Typ Geist treffen können.
flavor_text.es:
Los movimientos de tipo Normal o Lucha alcanzan a
los Pokémon de tipo Fantasma.
flavor_text.it:
Permette di colpire Pokémon di tipo Spettro
con mosse di tipo Normale e Lotta.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with
Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
flavor_text.ja:
ゴーストタイプの　ポケモンに
ノーマルタイプと　かくとうタイプの
技を　当てることが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
一般属性和格斗属性的招式
可以击中幽灵属性的宝可梦。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon ignores ghost-type Pokémon's immunity to normal- and fighting-type moves.

Ghost Pokémon's other types affect damage as usual.
short_effect: Lets the Pokémon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokémon.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
みずタイプの　わざを　じぶんに　よせつけ
ダメージは　うけずに　とくこうが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
물타입의 기술을 자신에게 끌어모아
데미지는 받지 않고 특수공격이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
將水屬性的招式引到自己身上，
不但不會受到傷害，
反而會提高特攻。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon détourne sur lui les capacités de
type Eau et les neutralise, tout en montant
son Attaque Spéciale.
flavor_text.de:
Zieht Wasser-Attacken an. Statt durch diese
Schaden zu nehmen, erhöht es den eigenen
Spezial-Angriff.
flavor_text.es:
Además de atraer y neutralizar los movimientos de
tipo Agua, sube el Ataque Especial.
flavor_text.it:
Attira e neutralizza mosse di tipo Acqua
e aumenta l’Attacco Speciale.
flavor_text.en:
Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit 
by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
flavor_text.ja:
みずタイプの　技を　自分に　よせつけ
ダメージは　受けずに　特攻が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
将水属性的招式引到自己身上，
不会受到伤害，而是会提高特攻。

effect_entry:
All other Pokémon's single-target water-type moves are redirected to this Pokémon, if it is an eligible target.  Other Pokémon's Water moves raise this Pokémon's Special Attack one stage, negating any other effect on it, and cannot miss it.

If the move's intended target also has this ability, the move is not redirected.  When multiple Pokémon with this ability are possible targets for redirection, the move is redirected to the one with the highest Speed stat, or, in the case of a tie, to a random tied Pokémon.  follow me takes precedence over this ability.
short_effect: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　あられのとき　ＨＰを
すこしずつ　かいふく　する。
flavor_text.ko:
날씨가 싸라기눈일 때 HP를
조금씩 회복한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣為冰雹時，
會漸漸回復ＨＰ。
flavor_text.fr:
Régénère les PV du Pokémon lors des tempêtes
de grêle.
flavor_text.de: Regeneriert bei Hagel nach und nach KP.
flavor_text.es:
Recupera PS de forma gradual cuando hay tormentas
de granizo.
flavor_text.it: Quando grandina, il Pokémon recupera PS.
flavor_text.en: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　あられのとき　ＨＰを
少しずつ　回復　する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
冰雹天气时，
会缓缓回复ＨＰ。

effect_entry: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during hail, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.
short_effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうかばつぐんに　なってしまう
こうげきの　いりょくを
よわめる　ことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
효과가 굉장한
공격의 위력을
약하게 만든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到效果絕佳的攻擊時，
可減弱其威力。
flavor_text.fr:
Réduit les dégâts subis lorsque le Pokémon
est touché par une capacité super efficace.
flavor_text.de:
Reduziert die Stärke von sehr effektiven Attacken
und verringert damit den Schaden, den das Pokémon
durch sie erleidet.
flavor_text.es:
Mitiga el daño que le infligen los movimientos
supereficaces.
flavor_text.it: Riduce la potenza delle mosse superefficaci subite.
flavor_text.en: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
flavor_text.ja:
効果バツグンに　なってしまう
攻撃の　威力を
弱める　ことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到效果绝佳的攻击时，
可以减弱其威力。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are super effective against it.

This ability functions identically to filter.
short_effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
とうじょう　したときに
てんきを　あられに　する。
flavor_text.ko:
등장했을 때
날씨를 싸라기눈으로 만든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
出場時，
會將天氣變為冰雹。
flavor_text.fr:
Déclenche une tempête de grêle quand le Pokémon
entre au combat.
flavor_text.de: Löst bei Kampfantritt Hagel aus.
flavor_text.es:
El Pokémon invoca una tormenta de granizo al entrar
en combate.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, provoca
una grandinata.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters
a battle.
flavor_text.ja:
登場　したときに
天気を　あられに　する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场时，
会将天气变为冰雹。

effect_entry:
The weather changes to hail when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.

If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, drought, or sand stream are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.
short_effect: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
せんとうが　おわったとき
あまいミツを　ひろうことが　ある。
flavor_text.ko:
배틀이 끝났을 때
달콤한꿀을 주울 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
戰鬥結束時，
有時候會撿來甜甜蜜。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon peut parfois trouver du Miel
après un combat.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon sammelt nach Kämpfen eventuell
Honig auf.
flavor_text.es:
Es posible que el Pokémon encuentre Miel una
vez concluido el combate.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon può raccogliere del Miele alla fine
della lotta.
flavor_text.en: The Pokémon may gather Honey after a battle.
flavor_text.ja:
戦闘が　終わったとき
あまいミツを　拾うことが　ある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
战斗结束时，
有时候会捡来甜甜蜜。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon has a chance of picking up honey after each battle.  This chance starts at 5% and rises another 5% after every tenth level: 5% from level 1–10, 10% from 11–20, and so on, up to 50% from 91–100.

This ability is checked after the battle ends, at which point any temporary ability changes have worn off.
short_effect: The Pokémon may pick up honey after battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
とうじょう　したとき
あいての　もちものを
みとおすことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
등장했을 때
상대의 지닌 물건을
통찰할 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
出場時，
可以察覺對手的持有物。
flavor_text.fr:
Permet de connaître l’objet tenu par l’ennemi
quand le combat commence.
flavor_text.de:
Kann bei Kampfantritt Auskunft über das vom
Gegner getragene Item geben.
flavor_text.es:
El Pokémon puede ver el objeto que lleva el rival al
entrar en combate.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, rivela
lo strumento del nemico.
flavor_text.en:
When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an
opposing Pokémon’s held item.
flavor_text.ja:
登場　したとき
相手の　持ち物を
見通すことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
出场时，
可以察觉对手的持有物。

effect_entry:
When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.

In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
short_effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
はんどうで　ダメージを
うける　わざの　いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
반동 데미지를
받는 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
會讓自己因反作用力而受傷的招式
威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités occasionnant
un contrecoup.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Stärke von Attacken mit
Rückstoßschaden.
flavor_text.es:
Potencia los movimientos que también dañan al
usuario.
flavor_text.it: Potenzia le mosse che causano contraccolpo.
flavor_text.en: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
flavor_text.ja:
反動で　ダメージを
受ける　技の　威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
自己会因反作用力受伤的招式，
其威力会提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's recoil moves and crash moves have 1.2× their base power.

struggle is unaffected.

The "crash moves" are the moves that damage the user upon missing: jump kick and high jump kick.
short_effect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
もっている　プレートや
Ｚクリスタルの　タイプによって
じぶんの　タイプが　かわる。
flavor_text.ko:
지니고 있는 플레이트나
Z크리스탈 타입에 따라
자신의 타입이 바뀐다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
自己的屬性會依持有的石板
或Ｚ純晶的屬性而改變。
flavor_text.fr:
Modifie le type du Pokémon en fonction de la plaque
ou du Cristal Z qu’il tient.
flavor_text.de:
Das Pokémon passt seinen Typ dem der getragenen
Tafel bzw. des getragenen Z-Kristalls an.
flavor_text.es:
Cambia el tipo del Pokémon al de la tabla o al del
Cristal Z que lleve.
flavor_text.it:
Cambia il tipo del Pokémon a seconda della lastra
o del Cristallo Z che ha con sé.
flavor_text.en:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the Plate or
Z-Crystal it holds.
flavor_text.ja:
持っている　プレートや
Ｚクリスタルの　タイプによって
自分の　タイプが　変わる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
自己的属性会根据持有的石板
或Ｚ纯晶的属性而改变。

effect_entry:
If this Pokémon is holding an elemental Plate, its type and form change to match the Plate.

This Pokémon's held item, whether or not it is a Plate, cannot be taken by covet or thief, nor removed by knock off, nor traded by switcheroo or trick.  Covet, Thief, and Knock Off still inflict damage against this Pokémon.  Unlike with sticky hold, this Pokémon cannot use fling, Switcheroo, or Trick to lose its item itself, nor gain an item through Switcheroo or Trick if it does not have one.

This ability has no effect for any Pokémon other than arceus.  This ability cannot be traded with skill swap, nor copied with role play or trace, nor disabled with gastro acid, nor changed with worry seed.  This Pokémon cannot use Skill Swap or Role Play to lose its ability itself.  mold breaker cannot ignore this ability.

If a Pokémon Transforms into an Arceus with this ability, it will Transform into Arceus's default, normal-type form.  If the Transforming Pokémon is holding a Plate, this ability will then activate and change the Pokémon into the corresponding form.
short_effect: Changes arceus's type and form to match its held Plate.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　はれのとき
じぶんと　みかたの　こうげきと
とくぼうの　のうりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
날씨가 맑을 때
자신과 같은 편의 공격과
특수방어의 능력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣為晴朗時，
自己和同伴的攻擊和
特防能力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente l’Attaque et la Défense Spéciale
du Pokémon et de ses alliés lorsque le soleil brille.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht bei Sonnenschein den Angriff und die
Spezial-Verteidigung aller Team-Pokémon.
flavor_text.es:
Aumenta el Ataque y la Defensa Especial de todos
los Pokémon del equipo si hace sol.
flavor_text.it:
Se la luce del sole è intensa, aumenta la Difesa
Speciale e l’Attacco del Pokémon e dei suoi alleati.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself
and allies in harsh sunlight.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　晴れのとき
自分と　味方の　攻撃と
特防の　能力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
晴朗天气时，
自己与同伴的攻击和
特防能力会提高。

effect_entry:
Friendly Pokémon have 1.5× their Attack and Special Defense during strong sunlight if any friendly Pokémon has this ability.

Unlike forecast, multitype, and zen mode, this ability is not tied to its Pokémon's form change; cherrim will switch between its forms even if it loses this ability.  As such, this ability also works if obtained by a Pokémon other than Cherrim.
short_effect: Increases friendly Pokémon's Attack and Special Defense to 1.5× during strong sunlight.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ねむり　じょうたいの　あいてに
ダメージを　あたえる。
flavor_text.ko:
잠듦 상태의 상대에게
데미지를 준다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 給予陷入睡眠狀態的對手傷害。
flavor_text.fr: Inflige des dégâts aux ennemis endormis.
flavor_text.de: Fügt schlafenden Gegnern Schaden zu.
flavor_text.es: Inflige daño a cualquier rival que esté dormido.
flavor_text.it: Infligge danni ai nemici addormentati.
flavor_text.en: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text.ja:
ねむり状態の　相手に
ダメージを　あたえる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 给予睡眠状态的对手伤害。

effect_entry: Opposing Pokémon take 1/8 of their maximum HP in damage after each turn while they are asleep.
short_effect: Damages sleeping opponents for 1/8 their max HP after each turn.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
さわられた　あいての　どうぐを
ぬすんで　しまう。
flavor_text.ko:
접촉한 상대의 도구를
훔친다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
盜取接觸到自己的
對手的道具。
flavor_text.fr:
Vole l’objet que tient l’attaquant quand le Pokémon
subit une attaque directe.
flavor_text.de: Stiehlt das Item des Angreifers bei Berührung.
flavor_text.es:
Si el rival usa un movimiento de contacto al atacar,
le roba el objeto.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon viene colpito da un attacco diretto,
ruba lo strumento di chi lo ha attaccato.
flavor_text.en:
Steals an item from an attacker that made
direct contact.
flavor_text.ja:
触られた　相手の　道具を
盗んで　しまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
盗取接触到自己的
对手的道具。

effect_entry:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, if it does not have a held item, it steals the attacker's held item.

This Pokémon cannot steal upon being knocked out.  It can steal if the attacker has a substitute, but cannot steal when its own Substitute is hit.  If a move hits multiple times, only the last hit triggers this ability.  If this Pokémon is wild, it cannot steal from a trained Pokémon.
short_effect: Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
わざの　ついか　こうかは　なくなるが
そのぶん　たかい　いりょくで
わざを　だすことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
기술의 추가 효과가 없어지지만
그만큼 높은 위력으로
기술을 사용할 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
招式會失去追加效果，
但可以用更高的威力使出招式。
flavor_text.fr:
Les capacités ayant un effet additionnel perdent
celui-ci, mais leur puissance augmente.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht die Stärke von Attacken, aber hebt dafür ihre
Zusatzeffekte auf.
flavor_text.es:
Sube la potencia de los movimientos en detrimento
de los efectos secundarios, que se ven anulados.
flavor_text.it:
Aumenta i danni delle mosse, ma ne annulla
gli effetti aggiuntivi.
flavor_text.en:
Removes additional effects to increase the power
of moves when attacking.
flavor_text.ja:
技の　追加効果は　なくなるが
そのぶん　高い　威力で
技を　出すことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
招式的追加效果消失，
但因此能以更高的威力使出招式。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's moves with extra effects have 1.3× their power, but lose their extra effects.

An effect chance is a move's chance to inflict a status ailment, cause a stat change, or make the target flinch in addition to the move's main effect. For example, thunder shock's paralysis is an extra effect, but thunder wave's is not, nor are knock off's item removal and air cutter's increased critical hit rate.

Moves that lower the user's stats are unaffected.
short_effect: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
のうりょくの　へんかが　ぎゃくてんして
あがるときに　さがり
さがるときに　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
능력의 변화가 역전해서
올라갈 때 떨어지고
떨어질 때 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
能力的變化會逆轉，
原本提高時會降低，
原本降低時會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Inverse les changements de stats :
les augmentations de stats se transforment
en baisses, et vice-versa.
flavor_text.de:
Statusveränderungen werden umgekehrt:
Statuswerte, die eigentlich erhöht werden sollten,
sinken und umgekehrt.
flavor_text.es:
Invierte los cambios en las características: bajan
cuando les toca subir y suben cuando les toca bajar.
flavor_text.it:
Le modifiche alle statistiche hanno effetto inverso:
aumentano quando dovrebbero diminuire
e viceversa.
flavor_text.en: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
flavor_text.ja:
能力の　変化が　逆転して
上がるときに　下がり
下がるときに　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
能力的变化发生逆转，
原本提高时会降低，
而原本降低时会提高。

effect_entry: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
short_effect: Inverts stat changes.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいてを　きんちょうさせて
きのみを　たべられなく　させる。
flavor_text.ko:
상대를 긴장시켜 나무열매를
먹지 못하게 한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
讓對手感到緊張，
無法吃樹果。
flavor_text.fr:
Fait stresser l’ennemi, ce qui l’empêche de manger
des Baies.
flavor_text.de:
Erzeugt beim Gegner Stress und hindert ihn so
daran, Beeren zu konsumieren.
flavor_text.es: Pone nervioso al rival y le impide usar bayas.
flavor_text.it:
Il nemico viene intimidito e non può mangiare
bacche.
flavor_text.en:
Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable
to eat Berries.
flavor_text.ja:
相手を　緊張させて
きのみを　食べられなく　させる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
让对手紧张，
使其无法食用树果。

effect_entry:
Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle.

Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
のうりょくを　さげられると
こうげきが　ぐーんと　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
능력이 떨어지면
공격이 크게 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
能力被降低時，
攻擊會大幅提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente beaucoup l’Attaque du Pokémon
quand ses stats baissent.
flavor_text.de:
Werden die Statuswerte des Pokémon gesenkt,
steigt sein Angriff stark.
flavor_text.es:
Sube mucho el Ataque cuando el rival le baja las
características.
flavor_text.it:
L’Attacco aumenta di molto quando le statistiche
diminuiscono a causa di un nemico.
flavor_text.en:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its
stats are lowered.
flavor_text.ja:
能力を　下げられると
攻撃が　ぐーんと　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
能力被降低时，
攻击会大幅提高。

effect_entry:
When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered, its Attack rises by two stages.

If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.
short_effect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ＨＰが　はんぶんに　なると
よわきに　なって　こうげきと
とくこうが　はんげんする。
flavor_text.ko:
HP가 절반이 되면
무기력해져서 공격과
특수공격이 반감된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
ＨＰ降到一半以下時，
會變得軟弱而使得
攻擊和特攻減半。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon devient défaitiste quand ses PV
tombent à la moitié, et son Attaque et son Attaque
Spéciale sont divisées par deux.
flavor_text.de:
Fallen seine KP auf die Hälfte des Maximalwerts oder
weniger, bekommt es Angst. Dadurch wird die Stärke
seines Angriffs und Spezial-Angriffs halbiert.
flavor_text.es:
Se debilita tanto cuando sus PS se ven reducidos a la
mitad que su Ataque y su Ataque Especial bajan.
flavor_text.it:
Quando i PS scendono a metà o meno, il Pokémon
si scoraggia e l’Attacco e l’Attacco Speciale
vengono dimezzati.
flavor_text.en:
Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats
when its HP becomes half or less.
flavor_text.ja:
ＨＰが　半分に　なると
弱気に　なって　攻撃と
特攻が　半減する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
ＨＰ减半时，
会变得软弱，
攻击和特攻会减半。

effect_entry: This Pokémon's Attack and Special Attack are halved when it has half its HP or less.
short_effect: Halves Attack and Special Attack at 50% max HP or less.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
こうげきを　うけると　あいての　わざを
かなしばり　じょうたいに
することが　ある。
flavor_text.ko:
공격을 받으면 상대의 기술을
사슬묶기 상태로
만들 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到攻擊時，
有時會把對手的招式
變為定身法狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Quand le Pokémon est touché par une capacité,
il inflige parfois Entrave sur celle-ci.
flavor_text.de:
Blockiert eventuell die Attacke, mit welcher der
Angreifer es getroffen hat.
flavor_text.es: Puede anular el movimiento usado en su contra.
flavor_text.it: A volte blocca l’ultima mossa usata dal nemico.
flavor_text.en: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
flavor_text.ja:
攻撃を　受けると　相手の　技を
かなしばり状態に
することが　ある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到攻击时，
有时会把对手的招式
变为定身法状态。

effect_entry: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じょうたい　いじょうの　みかたを
たまに　なおしてあげる。
flavor_text.ko:
같은 편의 상태 이상을
가끔 회복시킨다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 有時會治癒同伴的異常狀態。
flavor_text.fr:
Soigne parfois une altération de statut d’un allié
proche.
flavor_text.de: Befreit Mitstreiter gelegentlich von Statusproblemen.
flavor_text.es: A veces cura los problemas de estado de un aliado.
flavor_text.it: A volte cura i problemi di stato degli alleati.
flavor_text.en: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
flavor_text.ja:
状態異常の　味方を
たまに　治してあげる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 有时会治愈异常状态的同伴。

effect_entry: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any major status ailment after each turn.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
みかたの　ダメージを
へらすことが　できる。
flavor_text.ko:
같은 편의 데미지를
줄일 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 可以減少我方受到的傷害。
flavor_text.fr: Diminue les dégâts subis par les alliés.
flavor_text.de:
Kann den Schaden, den Mitstreiter erleiden,
verringern.
flavor_text.es: Reduce el daño que sufren los aliados.
flavor_text.it:
I danni inflitti agli alleati del Pokémon
vengono ridotti.
flavor_text.en: Reduces damage done to allies.
flavor_text.ja:
味方の　ダメージを
減らすことが　できる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 可以减少我方的伤害。

effect_entry:
All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle.

This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.
short_effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ぶつりわざで　ダメージを　うけると
ぼうぎょが　さがり
すばやさが　ぐーんと　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
물리 기술로 데미지를 받으면
방어가 떨어지고
스피드가 크게 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
因物理招式受到傷害時，
防禦會降低，
速度會大幅提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Quand le Pokémon est touché par une capacité
physique, sa Défense baisse mais sa Vitesse
augmente beaucoup.
flavor_text.de:
Senkt bei erlittenem Treffer durch eine physische
Attacke die Verteidigung des Pokémon, aber erhöht
dafür seine Initiative stark.
flavor_text.es:
Al recibir daño por un ataque físico, baja la Defensa,
pero sube mucho la Velocidad del Pokémon.
flavor_text.it:
Se si subiscono danni da mosse fisiche, la Difesa
diminuisce e la Velocità aumenta di molto.
flavor_text.en:
Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense
stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ja:
物理技で　ダメージを　受けると
防御が　下がり
素早さが　ぐーんと　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
如果因物理招式受到伤害，
防御会降低，
速度会大幅提高。

effect_entry:
Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.

This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
short_effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じぶんの　おもさが
２ばいに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
자신의 무게가
2배가 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 自己的重量會變為２倍。
flavor_text.fr: Double le poids du Pokémon.
flavor_text.de: Verdoppelt das eigene Gewicht.
flavor_text.es: Duplica el peso del Pokémon.
flavor_text.it: Raddoppia il peso del Pokémon.
flavor_text.en: Doubles the Pokémon’s weight.
flavor_text.ja:
自分の　重さが
２倍に　なる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 自身的重量会变为２倍。

effect_entry: This Pokémon has double the usual weight for its species.
short_effect: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
じぶんの　おもさが
はんぶんに　なる。
flavor_text.ko:
자신의 무게가
절반이 된다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 自己的重量會減半。
flavor_text.fr: Divise par deux le poids du Pokémon.
flavor_text.de: Halbiert das eigene Gewicht.
flavor_text.es: Reduce a la mitad el peso del Pokémon.
flavor_text.it: Dimezza il peso del Pokémon.
flavor_text.en: Halves the Pokémon’s weight.
flavor_text.ja:
自分の　重さが
半分に　なる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 自身的重量会减半。

effect_entry: This Pokémon has half the usual weight for its species.
short_effect: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ＨＰが　まんたんの　ときに
うける　ダメージが　すくなくなる。
flavor_text.ko:
HP가 꽉 찼을 때
받는 데미지가 줄어든다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
ＨＰ全滿時，
受到的傷害會變少。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon reçoit moins de dégâts quand ses PV
sont au maximum.
flavor_text.de: Verringert den erlittenen Schaden bei vollen KP.
flavor_text.es: Reduce el daño sufrido si los PS están al máximo.
flavor_text.it: Se i PS sono al massimo, riduce il danno subito.
flavor_text.en:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes
when its HP is full.
flavor_text.ja:
ＨＰが　満タンの　ときに
受ける　ダメージが　少なくなる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
ＨＰ全满时，
受到的伤害会变少。

effect_entry: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.
short_effect: Halves damage taken from full HP.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
どく　じょうたいに　なったとき
ぶつりわざの　いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
독 상태가 되었을 때
물리 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
陷入中毒狀態時，
物理招式的威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités physiques
quand le Pokémon est empoisonné.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht bei Vergiftungen die Stärke von physischen
Attacken.
flavor_text.es:
Aumenta la potencia de los ataques físicos cuando
el Pokémon está envenenado.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon è avvelenato, potenzia le mosse
fisiche.
flavor_text.en:
Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon
is poisoned.
flavor_text.ja:
どく状態に　なったとき
物理技の　威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
变为中毒状态时，
物理招式的威力会提高。

effect_entry: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Attack when poisoned.
short_effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× when poisoned.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
やけど　じょうたいに　なったとき
とくしゅわざの　いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
화상 상태가 되었을 때
특수 기술의 위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
陷入灼傷狀態時，
特殊招式的威力會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités spéciales
quand le Pokémon est brûlé.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht bei Verbrennungen die Stärke von
Spezial-Attacken.
flavor_text.es:
Aumenta la potencia de los ataques especiales
cuando el Pokémon sufre quemaduras.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon è scottato, potenzia le mosse
speciali.
flavor_text.en:
Powers up special attacks when the Pokémon
is burned.
flavor_text.ja:
やけど状態に　なったとき
特殊技の　威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
变为灼伤状态时，
特殊招式的威力会提高。

effect_entry: This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack when burned.
short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when burned.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
つかった　きのみを
なんかいも　つくりだす。
flavor_text.ko:
사용한 나무열매를
몇 번이고 만들어 낸다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
可多次採收
已被使用過的樹果。
flavor_text.fr: Permet de réutiliser une même Baie plusieurs fois.
flavor_text.de: Dieselbe Beere kann mehrmals verwendet werden.
flavor_text.es: Permite reutilizar varias veces una misma baya.
flavor_text.it: Può ricreare una bacca utilizzata.
flavor_text.en: May create another Berry after one is used.
flavor_text.ja:
使った　きのみを
何回も　作りだす。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
可以多次制作出
已被使用掉的树果。

effect_entry: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during strong sunlight.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
みかたの　こうげきを　よみとって
わざを　かいひする。
flavor_text.ko:
같은 편의 공격의 낌새를 읽고
기술을 회피한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
預測我方的攻擊，
並閃避其招式。
flavor_text.fr:
Le Pokémon anticipe et évite les attaques de
ses alliés.
flavor_text.de: Erkennt und pariert Attacken von Mitstreitern.
flavor_text.es: Elude los ataques de los aliados durante el combate.
flavor_text.it: Prevede ed evita gli attacchi degli alleati.
flavor_text.en: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
flavor_text.ja:
味方の　攻撃を　読み取って
技を　回避する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
读取我方的攻击，
并闪避其招式伤害。

effect_entry: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
short_effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
まいターン　のうりょくの　どれかが
ぐーんと　あがって　どれかが　さがる。
flavor_text.ko:
매 턴 능력 중 하나가
크게 오르고 하나가 떨어진다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
每一回合，能力中的某項
會大幅提高，相對地某項會降低。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente beaucoup une stat du Pokémon
et en baisse une autre au hasard à chaque tour.
flavor_text.de:
Erhöht in jeder Runde aufs Neue einen Statuswert
stark und senkt einen anderen.
flavor_text.es:
Cada turno sube mucho una característica, pero
baja otra.
flavor_text.it:
A ogni turno, aumenta di molto una statistica
e ne riduce un’altra.
flavor_text.en:
Raises one stat sharply and lowers another
every turn.
flavor_text.ja:
毎ターン　能力の　どれかが
ぐーんと　上がって　どれかが　下がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
每一回合，能力中的某项
会大幅提高，而某项会降低。

effect_entry:
After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage.

If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
short_effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
すなあらしや　あられなどの
ダメージを　うけない。
こなの　わざを　うけない。
flavor_text.ko:
모래바람이나 싸라기눈 등의
데미지를 입지 않는다.
가루의 기술을 받지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
不會受到沙暴或冰雹等的傷害。
不會受到粉末類招式的攻擊。
flavor_text.fr:
Protège des dégâts occasionnés par les tempêtes
de sable ou la grêle, et neutralise les attaques
à base de poudre.
flavor_text.de:
Nimmt weder durch Wetterlagen wie Sandsturm oder
Hagel noch durch Pulver oder Puder Schaden.
flavor_text.es:
Protege al Pokémon de las tormentas de arena, el
granizo y los movimientos con polvos.
flavor_text.it:
Rende immuni ai danni da grandine e tempesta di
sabbia, alle mosse Spora, Cottonspora, Sonnifero,
Paralizzante e alle mosse “polvere”.
flavor_text.en:
Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail,
and powder.
flavor_text.ja:
すなあらしや　あられなどの
ダメージを　受けない。
粉の　技を　受けない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
不会受到沙暴或冰雹等的伤害。
不会受到粉末类招式的攻击。

effect_entry: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
short_effect: Protects against damage from weather.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
さわる　だけで　あいてを
どく　じょうたいに　することがある。
flavor_text.ko:
접촉하기만 해도 상대를
독 상태로 만들 때가 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
有時僅是接觸
就能讓對手中毒。
flavor_text.fr: Peut empoisonner l’ennemi par simple contact.
flavor_text.de: Kann das Ziel durch bloßes Berühren vergiften.
flavor_text.es: Puede envenenar al objetivo con solo tocarlo.
flavor_text.it: Può avvelenare il nemico al solo contatto.
flavor_text.en:
May poison a target when the Pokémon
makes contact.
flavor_text.ja:
触る　だけで　相手を
どく　状態に　することがある。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
只通过接触就有可能
让对手变为中毒状态。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit.

This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust.  This ability takes effect before mummy.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てもちに　ひっこむと
ＨＰが　すこし　かいふくする。
flavor_text.ko:
지닌 포켓몬으로 돌아오면
HP를 조금 회복한다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
退回同行隊伍後，
ＨＰ會少量回復。
flavor_text.fr:
Restaure un peu de PV si le Pokémon est retiré
du combat.
flavor_text.de:
Wird das Pokémon ausgewechselt, regeneriert es
eine kleine Menge an KP.
flavor_text.es: Recupera unos pocos PS al cambiar de Pokémon.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon recupera un po’ di PS quando viene
sostituito.
flavor_text.en: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
flavor_text.ja:
手持ちに　引っ込むと
ＨＰが　少し　回復する。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
退回同行队伍后，
ＨＰ会少量回复。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon regains 1/3 of its maximum HP when it is switched out for another Pokémon under any circumstances other than having fainted.

This ability does not take effect when a battle ends.
short_effect: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
ぼうぎょを　さげる
こうかを　うけない。
flavor_text.ko:
방어를 떨어뜨리는
효과를 받지 않는다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 不會受到降低防禦的效果影響。
flavor_text.fr:
Empêche les capacités adverses de baisser
la Défense.
flavor_text.de:
Hindert Angreifer daran, die Verteidigung des
Pokémon zu senken.
flavor_text.es: Impide que el rival baje la Defensa del Pokémon.
flavor_text.it: Evita che la Difesa diminuisca.
flavor_text.en:
Protects the Pokémon from
Defense-lowering effects.
flavor_text.ja:
防御を　下げる
効果を　受けない。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 不会受到防御降低的效果。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.

This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.
short_effect: Protects against Defense drops.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てんきが　すなあらし　のとき
すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
날씨가 모래바람일 때
스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
天氣為沙暴時，
速度會提高。
flavor_text.fr: Augmente la Vitesse lors des tempêtes de sable.
flavor_text.de: Erhöht in Sandstürmen die Initiative.
flavor_text.es:
Aumenta la Velocidad durante las tormentas de
arena.
flavor_text.it: La Velocità aumenta durante le tempeste di sabbia.
flavor_text.en: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.
flavor_text.ja:
天気が　すなあらし　のとき
素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
沙暴天气时，
速度会提高。

effect_entry: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during a sandstorm, and it does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.
short_effect: Doubles Speed during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
へんかわざを　うけにくい
からだに　なっている。
flavor_text.ko:
변화 기술을 받기 어려운
몸으로 되어 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
不易受到變化類招式
攻擊的身體。
flavor_text.fr: Le Pokémon résiste mieux aux capacités de statut.
flavor_text.de: Wehrt mit robustem Körper viele Status-Attacken ab.
flavor_text.es:
Ofrece una mayor resistencia ante los ataques de
estado.
flavor_text.it: Resiste più facilmente alle mosse di stato.
flavor_text.en: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.ja:
変化技を　受けにくい
体に　なっている。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
成为不易受到变化招式
攻击的身体。

effect_entry: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
いちばん　さいごに　わざを　だすと
わざの　いりょくが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
제일 마지막에 기술을 쓰면
기술의 위력이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
如果在最後使出招式，
招式就會變強。
flavor_text.fr:
Augmente la puissance des capacités du Pokémon
s’il attaque en dernier.
flavor_text.de:
Greift das Pokémon zuletzt an, erhöht sich die
Stärke der Attacke, die es einsetzt.
flavor_text.es:
Aumenta la potencia del movimiento si es el último en
atacar.
flavor_text.it:
Se il Pokémon agisce per ultimo, la potenza
della mossa aumenta.
flavor_text.en: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
flavor_text.ja:
いちばん　最後に　技を　出すと
技の　威力が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
如果在最后使出招式，
招式的威力会提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn.

future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
short_effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
てもちの　いちばん　うしろに　いる
ポケモンに　なりきって　とうじょうして
あいてを　ばかす。
flavor_text.ko:
지닌 포켓몬 중 제일 뒤에 있는
포켓몬으로 둔갑하여 나와서
상대를 속인다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
假扮成同行隊伍中的
最後一個寶可夢出場，
迷惑對手。
flavor_text.fr:
Donne au Pokémon l’apparence du dernier membre
de l’équipe pour tromper l’adversaire.
flavor_text.de:
Führt den Gegner hinters Licht, indem es bei
Kampfantritt die Gestalt des Pokémon an der
letzten Stelle im Team annimmt.
flavor_text.es:
Adopta el aspecto del último Pokémon del equipo al
entrar en combate para desconcertar al rival.
flavor_text.it:
Il Pokémon inganna il nemico entrando in campo
con le sembianze dell’ultimo Pokémon della propria
squadra.
flavor_text.en:
Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in the party’s
last spot.
flavor_text.ja:
手持ちの　いちばん　うしろに　いる
ポケモンに　なりきって　登場して
相手を　化かす。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
假扮成同行队伍中的
最后一个宝可梦出场，
迷惑对手。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon, upon being sent out, appears to have the species, nickname, and Poké Ball of the last Pokémon in the party that is able to battle.  This illusion breaks upon being hit by a damaging move.

Other damage, e.g. from weather or spikes, does not break the illusion, nor does damage done to a substitute.

If the party order becomes temporarily shuffled around as Pokémon are switched out in battle, this ability chooses the last Pokémon according to that shuffled order.
short_effect: Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokémon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
めのまえの　ポケモンに
へんしん　してしまう。
flavor_text.ko:
눈앞의 포켓몬으로
변신해버린다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant: 變身為當前面對的寶可夢。
flavor_text.fr: Donne l’apparence du Pokémon adverse.
flavor_text.de: Kämpft als Kopie seines Gegenübers.
flavor_text.es: El Pokémon se transforma en el que tiene enfrente.
flavor_text.it: Il Pokémon si trasforma nel nemico che ha davanti.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon
it’s facing.
flavor_text.ja:
目の前の　ポケモンに
変身　してしまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans: 变身为当前面对的宝可梦。

effect_entry: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle.  This effect is identical to the move transform.
short_effect: Transforms upon entering battle.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいての　かべや　みがわりを
すりぬけて　こうげき　できる
flavor_text.ko:
상대의 벽이나 대타출동을
뚫고 공격할 수 있다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
可穿透對手的屏障
或替身進行攻擊。
flavor_text.fr:
Traverse les barrières et les clones de l’ennemi
pour attaquer directement.
flavor_text.de:
Überwindet gegnerische Schilde sowie Delegatoren
und greift an.
flavor_text.es: Ataca rodeando la barrera o el sustituto del rival.
flavor_text.it:
Attacca evitando le barriere e il sostituto
del nemico.
flavor_text.en:
Passes through the opposing Pokémon’s barrier,
substitute, and the like and strikes.
flavor_text.ja:
相手の　壁や　身代わりを
すりぬけて　攻撃　できる
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
可以穿透对手的壁障
或替身进行攻击。

effect_entry: This Pokémon's moves ignore light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
short_effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいてに　さわられると
あいてを　ミイラに　してしまう。
flavor_text.ko:
상대가 접촉하면
상대를 미라로 만들어버린다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
被對手接觸到時，
會將對手變成木乃伊。
flavor_text.fr:
Remplace le talent de l’attaquant par « Momie »
lorsque le Pokémon subit une attaque directe.
flavor_text.de:
Überträgt bei Berührung die Fähigkeit Mumie auf den
Angreifer.
flavor_text.es:
Contagia la habilidad Momia al rival que entre en
contacto con él.
flavor_text.it:
L’abilità del nemico diventa Mummia dopo
il contatto.
flavor_text.en:
Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s
Ability to Mummy.
flavor_text.ja:
相手に　触られると
相手を　ミイラに　してしまう。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
被对手接触到后，
会将对手变为木乃伊。

effect_entry:
Whenever a contact move hits this Pokémon, the attacking Pokémon's ability changes to Mummy.

multitype is unaffected.  If a Pokémon with moxie knocks this Pokémon out, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
short_effect: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あいてを　たおすと
じしんが　ついて
こうげきが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
상대를 쓰러뜨리면
자신감이 붙어서
공격이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
如果打倒對手，
會充滿自信並提高攻擊。
flavor_text.fr:
Quand le Pokémon met un ennemi K.O., sa confiance
en lui ne connaît plus de limite et son Attaque
augmente.
flavor_text.de:
Besiegt es ein Pokémon, steigt sein Selbstvertrauen
und somit auch sein Angriff.
flavor_text.es:
Al debilitar a un objetivo, su confianza se refuerza
de tal manera que aumenta el Ataque.
flavor_text.it:
Quando manda un nemico KO, il Pokémon si fa
sicuro di sé e aumenta il proprio Attacco.
flavor_text.en:
The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the
Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
flavor_text.ja:
相手を　倒すと
自信が　ついて
攻撃が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
如果打倒对手，
就会充满自信，攻击会提高。

effect_entry:
This Pokémon's Attack rises one stage upon knocking out another Pokémon, even a friendly Pokémon.

This ability does not take effect when the Pokémon indirectly causes another Pokémon to faint, e.g. through poison or spikes.

If this Pokémon knocks out a Pokémon with mummy, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
short_effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あくタイプの　こうげきを　うけると
せいぎかんで　こうげきが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
악타입 공격을 받으면
정의감으로 공격이 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到惡屬性的招式攻擊時，
因為正義感，攻擊會提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Réveille la noblesse du Pokémon lorsqu’il subit
une capacité de type Ténèbres, ce qui augmente
son Attaque.
flavor_text.de:
Wird es von einer Unlicht-Attacke getroffen, meldet
sich sein Sinn für Gerechtigkeit zu Wort und sein
Angriff steigt.
flavor_text.es:
Si le alcanza un movimiento de tipo Siniestro,
aumenta el Ataque debido a su integridad.
flavor_text.it:
Quando il Pokémon viene colpito da una mossa
di tipo Buio, il suo forte senso di giustizia fa sì
che l’Attacco aumenti.
flavor_text.en:
Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack
stat of the Pokémon, for justice.
flavor_text.ja:
あくタイプの　攻撃を　受けると
正義感で　攻撃が　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到恶属性的招式攻击时，
因为正义感，攻击会提高。

effect_entry:
Whenever a dark-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage.

The move is not negated in any way.
short_effect: Raises Attack one stage upon taking damage from a dark move.

flavor_text.ja_Hrkt:
あくタイプと　ゴーストタイプと
むしタイプの　わざを　うけると
びびって　すばやさが　あがる。
flavor_text.ko:
악타입과 고스트타입과
벌레타입의 기술을 받으면
주눅이 들어 스피드가 올라간다.
flavor_text.zh_Hant:
受到惡屬性、幽靈屬性
和蟲屬性的招式攻擊時，
會因膽怯而使得速度提高。
flavor_text.fr:
Si le Pokémon est touché par une capacité de type
Ténèbres, Spectre ou Insecte, sa phobie se révèle
et sa Vitesse augmente.
flavor_text.de:
Wird es von einer Unlicht-, Geister- oder Käfer-
Attacke getroffen, bekommt es Angst und seine
Initiative steigt.
flavor_text.es:
Si le alcanza un movimiento de tipo Siniestro, Bicho o
Fantasma, el miedo hace que le suba la Velocidad.
flavor_text.it:
Le mosse di tipo Buio, Spettro e Coleottero
spaventano il Pokémon aumentandone la Velocità.
flavor_text.en:
Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the
Pokémon and boost its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ja:
あくタイプと　ゴーストタイプと
むしタイプの　技を　受けると
びびって　素早さが　上がる。
flavor_text.zh_Hans:
受到恶属性、幽灵属性
和虫属性的招式攻击时，
会因胆怯而速度提高。
